Summary: NO BASIC SERVICES: We arrived late night, and there was no hot water, and there wasn’t hot in the morning either. There were no pots, dishes, cutlery or rags in the kitchen. POOR CLEANLINESS: The  room was not clean. We found fake eye lashes in the washroom mirror, hair stuck in the shower walls, a spider squashed into the wall. NOT WELL MAINTAINED: The remote control in the bedroom had ran out of batteries. We were moved to another room, and this one did not have any doors in the closet. SERVICE: Good. Maintenance came right away to show us how to operarte the thermostat. We were not told in the front desk that we had to turn on a  hidden switch underneath the control panel and also insert a cart in a slot next to the entrance. BREAKFAST: Basic but good (plain eggs, bacon,
Manager Response: Dear T500FUII,  Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us and future guests with your experience at our Anaheim/Orange property. Please accept our apologies for the inconveniences you encountered with the cleanliness of the room as well as the lack of hot water on your check in date. As you might have learned, we were undergoing an emergency repair with one of our water heaters. This issue was resolved and now all the rooms have hot water in them.  We truly hope that you can give us another chance at staying at our property. As you saw during your stay, we are currently undergoing major renovations and we hope that by the summer, the entire property will be fully renovated. Thank you again for your feedback. We greatly appreciate your business.

Summary: I love this hotel  you get a suite at half the cost of a normal room at other places..   I have been here multiple times in the past..  I always dont want to leave when my stay is completed :)   the General Manager and the manager here are top notch quality thank you !!
Manager Response: We love your 5 star rating and the kind comments. We hope to see you again on your next travels.

Summary: Incredible property. Clean, accessible, warmly inviting at every corner. Although the property itself is very satisfying, the staff makes this location special. I felt like I was visiting with friends ~ nice change from recent travels.
Manager Response: Dear 11katya11,  We are very appy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay during your recent visit to our Anaheim/Orange property. Thank you for the perfect score you have provided for our property. We hope you were able to partake in our free hot breakfast, which consists of waffles (where you make your own), sausace or bacon, red potatoe cubes, cereal, yogurt, fruits, coffee, tea, orange/apple juice and many more. We are also located a few minutes away from the following tourist attactions: Disneyland, The Honda Center, Angels Stadium and Knott's Berry Farm. We are looking forward to your next stay at our Best Western Plus property.

Summary: We like this Inn very much and use it often, it is close to the location we need but this morning when I made a reservation I talked to a man who was the rudest I have ever had. He was very abrupt and had no time to take my new email address. He was short and never gave me an opportunity to speak. if you don't like your job and if you are terrible at customer service get a new job. If anyone checks these reviews from the company find out who was working your front desk on February 16 in the morning and it was a man. To bad he reflects your Inn.

We got a beautiful clean Suite for a great price. We didn’t have any issues with noise. The location was near all the activities we were doing. Will definitely be staying with Best Western again! thank you! <3
Manager Response: Dear stephaniepmora,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Best Western property. We are very happy to hear that your enjoyed your overall stay and that the room that was given to you was to your liking. We hope you were able to enjoy the free hot breakfast we provide to all of our guest, which consists of waffles, scrambled eggs, bacon/sausage, yogurt, fruits, freshly brewed coffee, cereal etc. We are looking forward to your next stay at Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites.

Summary: Great customer service! The rooms are pretty nice. Luis at the front desk was super cool! The pool is heated which was great for winding down. The breakfast is also pretty good, the waffle machine is super cool. My favorite part was how nice and cool everyone was especially Luis who was super friendly and chill.
Manager Response: Dear L3219XTtrevors,  Thank you so much for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites property. We are extremely happy to read that you enjoyed the great customer service that was provided during your stay and that you found our rooms to your liking. It is also great to hear that you and your family were able to enjoy the heated pool as well as the hot tub during your stay. Thank you so much for the wonderful comments you have regarding our front desk agent, Luis. We will let him know of the wonderful job he is doing so he can be rewarded accordingly. We hope that on your next travels to the Anaheim/Orange area, you will choose to stay with us again.

Summary: The staff is great very helpful great customer service skills.  The housekeepers were very helpful and caring.  The room was great felt like I was in my own home. The breakfast was delicious.  The area has lots of places to visit very close to the Block of Orange.
Manager Response: Dear msbettybell,  Thank you for providing us with such a wonderful review on your recent stay at our property. We are delighted to hear about the great customer service that you received by our front desk and housekeeping personnel. Yes, we are located within walking distance to the Block of Orange (5-7 minutes) and are also in close proximity to The Honda Center, Angel Stadium and Disneyland. We hope you can stay with us on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: I would like to inform everyone who often needs to spend their holidays in a hotel to often choose Best Western Hotel if they really want to rest because Best Western has the good employees, breakfast and the rooms are thoroughly clean. Martin N. Mpak
Manager Response: Dear mntawoussa8, Thank you so much for the wonderful review you have on our property. We are delighted to hear that our employees shined for your during your stay and that you have recommended us to friends and family due to the cleanliness of our rooms. We are also happy to read that you enjoyed our hot complimentary breakfast and we are looking forward to your next stay at our property.

Summary: The hotel shows its age, our two-queen suites were spacious though. What really turned me off was housekeeping service.Guests need to request housekeeping 24 hours in advance. I did, and left a tip for housekeeping. When we got back, someone had been in the room, replaced bath towels and some consumables (coffee cups, etc.) and collected the tip. They did NOT make the beds. (Did I need to leave a bigger tip to get the beds made?) Called front desk to complain, was told that the room would be made up the following morning. But when we got back again, the beds still hadn't been made, and this time no one had been in the room at all. Extremely disappointed and unhappy with the service.
Manager Response: Dear benjamj,   Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your recent trip to the Anaheim/Orange area and thank you for informing us about your experience at our property. Please accept our most sincere apologies for the misunderstanding you had with the housekeeping service. We will look into this issue a bit more so we can bring a quick solution to it. We are sorry to hear that due to this issue we did not exceed your expectations. We just hope you will be able to stay with us once more so you can see all the improvements we have made since your last stay.

Summary: I was greeted with a friendly smile and polite gesture from receptionist.  Without hesitation, he then gave us a free upgrade to king suite no extra charge. The room was clean and smell good.  The breakfast was good.  Hotel location is at the center of everything and very quiet.  No traffic noise.  Will be back again if I have a chance.
Manager Response: Dear vinhnguyen98, It brings us such joy to read the wonderful comments you have regarding your recent stay at our property. We are very happy that you and your party were received with a friendly smile and a polite gesture by one of our team members. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and that you stayed with us due to the location of our property. As you already know, we are next to the Outlets of Orange, a few minutes away from; The Anaheim Convention Center, The Honda Center and of course, Disneyland. We are looking forward to providing you and your party with an exceptional customer service on your next stay at Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites.

Summary: We came here as a couple from the UK as a ten day trip to visit Disney Land as annual pass holders. We haven’t stayed at a best western before and reviews were quite good. Price wasn’t bad either. Location was perfect for what we needed in regards to short journey times to the parks, and local restaurants. There is a shuttle service advertised on hotel sites to the parks however we did not use it and I think it’s at least a 15 minute walk to the bus stop you would need to get to to visit the park.  First of all the check in process was relatively simple. Nothing abnormal about this hotel compared to any other. Very little information was given to us about the hotel other than a sheet with a list of amenities and timings for the free breakfast. There is no cleaning service at all

We have stayed many times in the past at this Hotel over the years. So when we decided to take a family vacation with two other families this was the place to stay. It was always clean, had a great breakfast, great customer service and heated pool with hot tub. Always felt safe here as needed key to even access hallway to inside of rooms. Shuttle to Disney was also available.  Well we were quite surprised when we arrived. The grounds were unkept, the rooms were clean but chair and hide a bed seemed a bit worn. After our 8 year old got settled in she wanted to swim. Pool was cold, my husband checked in with clerk at front desk and told heater was not working and neither was the hot tub. Had we been told this when we booked the rooms we would have stayed elsewhere. Kids on this
Manager Response: Dear Rozeetravel,   Let me start by apologizing for the inconvenience you encountered during your recent stay at our property. We take every feedback from our valued guests seriously and we would like to thank you for informing us about your findings during your stay. We will make sure to inform our maintenance, housekeeping and housemen about your feedback so issues like the ones you encountered do not happen again to you or to any future guest. Please know that our hot tub is almost fixed so it will be back in service in the next week or so. In regards to the pool, our pool is in working order and it's heated; we keep the temperature at 80 - 85 degrees. We stopped doing the shuttle to Disneyland since COVID started and we have not brought it  back, but we are currently working on getting the service back. Again, please accept our most sincere apologies. We will fix those issues you mentioned and we just hope that you will be able to give us another chance at staying at our property in the near future.

Summary: I can not thank enough to each and every one specially to the Manager of the hotel Mr. Adrian, to Mr. Luis the most friendly person I know in U.S. from the day first he greet us like a family, Miss Rene, she is so sweet, and last but not least, Ms. Nykie, such a experienced host, thanks to all of them and I never forget what they have done for us during our stay at this HOTEL. if I ever come back to California, I will come to either stay at this hotel of to see these beautiful people.
Manager Response: Dear 739parvinm,  Thank you very much for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at our property. And thank you so much for the wonderful words you have for our team members; I am sure they will be happy to read your comments. We are very happy to read that the General Manager of the property, Adrian shined for you during your stay, as well our ops manager, Rene. Thank you for the wonderful words you have for Nykie and also thank you thank you thank you for telling us about the wonderful interactions you had with Luis during the very first time you and your family checked into our property. We cannot thank you enough for your loyalty to our brand/property. We wish you the best on your travels and just remember that you and your family are always welcome with open arms to Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites.

Summary Heading: Couldn’t sleep because of light outside room
Summary: There is a bright light outside my room and the curtains aren’t wide enough to shut out the light. The breakfast was good. I couldn’t find the hair dryer, so I tried to call the front desk, but the phone in the room doesn’t work. And the shampoo dispenser in the shower fell off when I was trying to use it. Usually I have a good experience with Best Western, but not here.
Manager Response: Dear Cr1717,  Thank you for informing us about your recent experience at our Best Western Plus property. We are very sorry to hear of the issues you encountered with your room; such as the curtains not been wide enough to completely shut out the light into the room, the room not having a hair dryer and the room phone not working. We would have loved for you to have given us the room number so we could have fixed this issue ASAP. But be assure that this issue with the room will be fixed and we hope you can give us another chance at staying with on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: We traveled with a cheer group consisting of small children for a Disney performance. Chaperone rooms were separated from children rooms. The rooms were DISGUSTING! One room had animal feces in it and we had to ask twice before it was addressed. Two rooms had ants in them. And I am covered in bug bites! Front desk staff was very rude and condescending and not helpful at all.
Manager Response: Dear cherishthehereandnow,  Thank you for providing us with your review on our property. We are extremely sorry to hear that we did not exceed your expecations. Please note that all of our team members are highly trained to provide an adequate customer service so this comes as a surprise, but we aware that we will take the appropriate actions to do an internal investagation on what happened during your check-in process. We just hope that this experience does not affect you staying with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: My most recent visit this week
Summary: I would not recommend this Best Western.  I did not get the room I requested.  Did not find out till my arrival.  Feel like it could have been handled more efficiently.  Had to get new room keys made more than once.  Never got the room I wanted. Good variety of food for breakfast and beds were comfortable
Manager Response: Dear anitamckenney, Thank you for your recent stay at our Best Western property. We are glad to hear that our free hot breakfast was to your liking and that the beds were comfortable. Please accept our apologies for the mistunderstanding on the room type you booked. I agree that this discrepancy could have been handled more effectively by our team members. But this feedback will serve as a training scenario so this does not happen again to any of our valued guests. We look forward to your next stay at our Anaheim/Orange property.

Summary Heading: EXCELLENT PROPERTY DUE TO SERVICE ORIENTED FRONT DESK STAFF MEMBERS
Summary: Excellent guest service provided by Front Desk staff Paul and Nyke. Made us feel welcomed during the check in process. Convenient location, near everything we wanted to go. Shopping, entertainment and places to eat is within the area. Very quite location away from major city traffic. Very comfortable and clean room.
Manager Response: Dear rogercE25MO, Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our property. We are happy to read that both Nyke and Luis made you stay at our property a more enjoyable one. Yes, we are conveniently located about 5 minutes (walking) from the Outlets of Orange, and about 10 mintues away from Disneyland. There are also plenty to restaurants around the area. We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay and we are looking forward to you next stay at our property.

Summary: We stayed with a large group and our booking agent Kira was fantastic. She went above and beyond. Our rooms were clean, the breakfast was hot and fresh and the location was perfect. We enjoyed the courtyard area seating for breakfast too.
Manager Response: Dear stacyto22, Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our Anaheim property. We are happy to read that our booking agent, Kira went above and beyond when booking your group reservation. We are also happy to know that the room were to your liking and that was to your liking as well. We hope that on your next group booking, you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: My family and I stayed for 25 nights and none of those days did we ever get housekeeping. We had an incident with the employees so I called the company and staff were aware of this and why? One of the staff made a rude comment to my mother. My question is, why were the staff aware of the situation? Isn't it suppose to be confidential? Also the pool and jacuzzi were always dirty and they never did anything about it. Overall it's been the worst stay I ever experienced.
Manager Response: Dear mar14132,  Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience

Summary: What made this trip memorable was 1  staff member that worked at this hotel. In particular, a Philippine born gal called Tana that worked serving up the food and maintaining the breakfast area during the 3 hours from 7-10 am.During my three day stay, I would start the day with breakfast.That's when I first noticed Tana. A staff member with a smile and lots of energy.In times past, I had to approach staff members if I had a specific request or question. Not so with Tana.  A very conscientious worker who went the extra mile  in the duty and service of her job. The last morning of my stay ,I came in to breakfast after a full morning of preparation for the departure ahead. It was at the the end of the breakfast ( the staff was cleaning up).She took notice of me, asked If I wanted
Manager Response: Dear 301camh,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review you have on one of our breakfast team members. We are extremely happy to read of the wonderful experience you had with this particular member and we are very very happy that she shined for you during your stay. We believe in providing an exceptional customer service to all of our guests and we are glad to hear that this is what Tanny did for you during your stay. We will let her know of the wonderful feedback you have of her great customer service and we hope you will choose to stay with us on your upcoming Holiday plans.

Summary: No issues. A bit old. Pool was good but hot tub wasn’t working. Uber to Disneyland was $7-$10 depending on time of day. Quick walk to outlet mall. Good breakfast but wish it started at 630 instead of 7. Price was good compared to hotels closer to cover Uber costs. Room was also 2 rooms which provided lots of space. Good value.
Manager Response: Dear Dave G.,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are happy to read that you enjoyed your stay at our Anaheim/Orange property. We are also happy to read that you stayed with us due to its proximity to Disneyland. We are looking forward to your next stay at our property.

Summary: Beautiful foyer and breakfast area.  Only decent thing about the rooms is the bed.  Very run down and had to move to a different room it was smelly and fan didn't work.  Staff was nice and seemed to try their best, but this property needs major updating.
Manager Response: Dear 52paulp,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your most recent stay at our property. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary hot breakfast, as well as our beds. Please accept our apologies for having to move you to a different room and thank you for your understanding. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: The hotel is old, but that's alright. The bathroom has hair, that's not alright. Also, the hot tub is extremely dirty. We went at night and couldn't see how dirty it is, I got hives all over me within 5 minutes being in the water.
Manager Response: Dear Shallen000, Thank you for providing us with your feedback. We are very sorry to hear of your recent experience at our property. Please know that currently the hot tub is out of service and the reason for noticing the hot tub dirty is due to the fact that we need a new water filter. We hope that your recent experience at our property does not deter your from staying with us again in the near future.

Summary: I definitely do not recommend this hotel. When we first got into our room my kids found a bunch of ants in the bathroom around the tub. We reserved for four guests and there were only two bath towels in the room. The hot tub was freezing cold the entire time we were there. The pool is supposed to open at 9. My husband and kids went down at 9:15 and it wasn't opened. We called front desk and we were made to feel we were inconveniencing them for asking if the pool would be open soon.  Everything was very dirty and run down. There was a sign outside of the breakfast area stating we couldn't leave with food as they believe we would be feeding people that were not guests at the hotel. This was very frustrating as we have two young children and my husband wanted to grab food for us
Manager Response: Dear T-Leanne, Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay at our property. Please accept our apologies for not having exceeded your expectations during your stay. During your stay we were extremely short staffed, but now we are all back in full housekeeping capacity so there should be no more issues with towels. We hope that in the future you can consider staying with us once more.

Summary: This hotel was clean and comfortable. The beds were comfortable and there were plenty of towels/wash cloths for the number of guests. Hotel is in a good location and close to shopping and places to eat.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our property. We are happy to read that you found to stay to be a comfortable one and that your room was supplied with plenty of towels for your to use. Yes, we are located near The Anaheim Convention Center, Angel Stadium and Disneyland. We hope you can consider staying with us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Not what it used to be.
Summary: I have stayed here several times and this time it was completely dirty and no attention was paid to the cleanliness of it. The pool was dirty and only cleaned out when I ask them to do it. The hot tub was out as well and only fix on our last day there. There was a used bar of soap in the shower and hair on the walls of the shower. The sink plug and hole had nasty mole on it, the carpets where completely dirty with spills and the bedding also had hair and rips on it.  I spoke with front desk and they offer to change room or cancel the reservation. I would honestly would have cancelled the reservation but I had just driven over 20 hours and was way to tired to struggle and find a new option, so we just switch room. The other room was better but still not in the best shape. We also
Manager Response: Dear gtena8, Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your feedback on your recent stay at our property. We greatly value your feedback and we thank you for what you have told us. And at the same time, we would like to apologize for not having exceeded your expectations. We will improve on all of those aspects you mentioned and we just hope you will be able to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Immediately questioned by the staff as I came in. I was added to my girlfriends reservation, and as I checked it they had me call her to verify that I was who i said I was....Even though I'm on the reservation.... My cousin dropped me off, so while the front desk lady was using my phone (to talk to my gf) she repeatedly looked back and forth between my cousin and I to which I said "this is my cousin"....  Room was absolutely filthy/broken, rusted shower rails, hair stuck to the bathroom door, tiles broken, cabinets broken, water and dirt residue on the walls.   Someone got arrested in the parking lot.  Tried to get a different hotel, but unfortunately was unable to. Hands down the grossest room I've stayed in, in Orange County; ever.  To add onto that, when I gave my card for
Manager Response: Dear msnyder1010, Thank for for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay at our property. Please accept our most sincere apologies for the inconvenience you encountered during the check-in process. Although, the room booked under a difference person, and you were added into that reservation, we just needed to make sure that the correct person was checking into the room. We will speak with the person that checked you in and we will retrain that person in how to properly charge a room. Again, I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and we will make sure to take care of those issues you mentioned with the room.

Summary: You have to request housekeeping services. After three days of requesting services and nobody showing up, I spoke to covering supervisor and someone finally showed up. We had to go to the front desk to get our towels, toilet paper  and body wash when we ran out. One night we came back to our room to find a whole bunch of ants in our kitchen area and in the bathroom. We had to move to a different room at 1:00 am and the room we were moved to, also had ants in the bathroom. We also found used face masks under furniture. One night two of my kids woke up with bug bites on their legs. This place is very dirty, they are in need of more staff and the staff that is there needs to be taught how to properly clean a room.
Manager Response: Dear Andrajglica99, Thank you for your feedback. We are extremely sorry to hear about the experience you encountered on your recent stay at our property. And we will look into fixing those issues you have mentioned in your review. As you saw during your stay, housekeeping in offered on a per request basis, but the front desk does have fresh towels, we can either have someone deliver them to you or you can come to the front desk to pick them up. Again, we are truly sorry to the inconvenience and we hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: Great priced hotel but, it’s a bit aged. The AC in my room didn’t work well but, still a good place to pay your head. Very roomy suites. Not sure if I would stay again but, it has everything you need and very convenient area.
Manager Response: Dear Mahinatrading,  Thank you so much for staying with us and thank for you for your feedback. We apologize for the A/C not working and we hope the issue was fixed ASAP. Yes, we are conveniently located to places such as: Disneyland, The Honda Center, Anaheim Stadium, Orange Outlets, UCI Medical Center, as well as The Discovery Cube. We truly hope you will select Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites on your next visit to the Anaheim/Orange area.

Summary: First of all the price was right and the hotel cleanliness was great! I would stay at the same hotel again. when I arrived The staff was very helpful. I would recommend this hotel to anyone great pies rooms are clean and upgraded. I really enjoyed my stay. The last time I stayed at hotel Lulu across the street from Disneyland it was not a good experience the shower was broken the soap dispensers for the shampoo was broken and the towels were damp the sheets on the bed were wet damp
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes of your time to provide us with your review. We are extremely excited to read that you greatly enjoyed your stay at our Best Western property and that our entire staff shined during your stay. Thank you also for the future references you will give our property and your continued business. We are waiting for your return visit so we can continue to surpass your expectations.

Summary: The staff was very nice.  We arrived a little past midnight. Front desk was friendly. When we went into our hotel room there was a dingy smell. The AC kept turning on and off every 30 seconds, I went to get into bed and the sheets were stained.  I called front desk and they switch us rooms right away.  The second room was better. Still an odor, there was stains on the carpet like brown. The sink was leaking, the wall picture was sitting on the kitchen counter, and there was ants in the bathroom and the second tv kept randomly turning on throughout the night.  I wouldn’t stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.  On behalf of our entire team, I would like to apologize for not exceeding your expectations. Your satisfaction is important to us and we will be using the feedback you gave us to implement improvements to ensure we offer a better experience for guests in the future.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again so that we can have another chance to provide you with a superior experience.  If I can provide any assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me directly at 714-740-2700.  Sincerely,  The Staff & Management Team. BW PLUS Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange

Summary: Rooms were very out-dated and dirty everywhere. Had ants all over the place even before we checked into the room. Air conditioner needs your key to be entered in the slot at the entrance of the room, but doesn't cool the rooms and is very old. Very limited breakfast options, more on the sugary and quick & unhealthy options.
Manager Response: Dear Journey718081,  Thank you for providing us with your feedback on your recent stay! Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience you encountered with the room that was issued to you. As always, we greatly value your feedback and it is with your feedback that we improve the condition of our room for you (on your future visit) and for other guests to enjoy. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: Location was close to our family reunion.  Definitely could have stayed somewhere better for similar price,  but last experience at Best Western in San Diego was so nice,  thought we'd trust another Best Western.  Clearly the brand is not consistent.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your detailed experience on your recent stay at Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites, Anaheim-Orange. As we strive to provide a clean environment for our guests, your review of our property will be used as an example on the things we need to improve on. We hope that on a future visit to the city of Orange/Anaheim, you will be able to stay with us and see the improvements we have made.

Summary Heading: Feels like a Disneyland mid-level hotel
Summary: This is the second BW plus that we stayed in Orange county for the month of July. Our destination is UC Irvine, and I wanted to check what we get if we stay a bit farther with a similar rate to the BW plus near SNA airport. As a property, this is definitely a much better property compared to the BW we stayed before (see my other reviews): - the room is larger, and has a living room area separeted from the bathroom and a kitchen - it has a typical BW plus design, with the pool in the middle - it was a 30 minute drive to UC Irvine (a minus, but that is ok) - Compared to the previous BW plus, which has a more business feel, this one has more of a family hotel feel - the carpets on the common areas look older with stains, which is typical when you have kids that walk out of the pool
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your review on your recent stay at our Orange/Anaheim property. We greatly value your feedback and we are very happy to hear that you found this property to your liking. Yes, we do serve free hot breakfast, which consist orange/apple juice, cereal, yogurt, toast, pastry, coffee, waffles, eggs, bacon, and sausage upon other breakfast items. We will make a note of the small issues you found with the property so they can be addressed to our maintenance team. Thank you again for the wonderful review and we hope we will be your place of stay whenever you are in the UC Irvine area.

Summary: We stayed at many best westerns. This was a nice location however we had issues in our room with the ac. You have to use your room key to work your ac. Ours wasn’t cooling snd took awhile to get moved another room. I give 3because room we finally got was clean but only had 2 towels and staff reacted to issues as if it were an error on our part operating the ac. But I understand things breakdown but this should have been checked before putting guests in a room.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a few minutes out of your busy schedule to provide us with your experience! We apologize for the issues you encountered with the AC. As you were able to see, our A/C system works by inserting the room key into the key slot, but a quick call to the front desk will have taken care of the issue at hand. I will make a note of the number of towels that were placed in the room, so this does not happen again. We hope you are able to give us another chance at servicing you and your guests in future bookings.

Summary Heading: This is NOT a BW "Plus" quality hotel!!
Summary: Overall the hotel was dingy and run down.  Cleanliness, especially in the common areas, was terrible.  Trash cans overflowing, landscaping neglected, carpets very dirty and worn, non carpeted areas had dried up sticky spills in multiple areas, elevators filthy (tracks, windows, buttons, doors barely closing).  Swimming pool and spa were very murky and unhealthy looking  - didn't use it for this reason.  The whole place needs paint, deep cleaning, updated furniture etc etc. The list is a long one!  Inside room, bed was comfortable, but living room furniture was worn, dirty and springs were shot in the chair so it was unusable.  Got sheets from housekeeping to cover the sofa so we could sit on it.  Light fixture and smoke detector in room was hanging by a wire (maintenance did
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your detailed experience on your recent stay at Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites, Anaheim-Orange. As we strive to provide a clean environment for our guests, your review of our property will be used as an example on the things we need to improve on. We hope that on a future visit to the city of Orange/Anaheim, you will be able to stay with us and see the improvements we have made.

Summary: Unfortunately, there isn’t really anything good to say about this place, other than maybe the parking being close by and convenient. After that, it’s all downhill. Rooms are VERY worn and dated, and carpet smells terrible like it’s been there since the 80’s. The staff is extremely rude and unhelpful. Set up is odd, looks like it’s inside an old business building with rooms in a humid dark hallway and the others facing the LOUD pool, which they do not enforce the hours of, so warning you may have parties outside your room until all hours of the night. We did. Security did nothing to quiet people down. You will hear everything here,basically zero insulation. Very disappointed in this place. Would not recommend to anyone. Much better options in the area for the price.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing us with your detailed experience on your recent stay at Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites, Anaheim-Orange. As we strive to provide a clean environment for our guests, your review of our property will be used as an example on the things we need to improve on. We hope that on a future visit to the city of Orange/Anaheim, you will be able to stay with us and see the improvements we have made.

Summary: The Best Western Meridian is a beautiful building in a plaza with very beautiful buildings.  But, the beauty ends there.  The place is very old inside, signs of unpleasant aging everywhere.  Dirty windows, hallways not keep clean, public bathrooms do not smell good.  The front lobby is immaculate but, once you pass the lobby it is not even 1 star.  I found dead insects in the chest of drawers, ants crawling around, sloppy painting,  The standard room is very small with very little light, a very tiny bathroom,  Looks unkempt and needs remodeling.   No room cleaning, trash pickup, or new towels for four days.  The place is old and worn out.  From the hallway in back of the hotel you get a good view of trash piled up, old mattresses, broken chairs, and other trash strewn about

Summary Heading: Very Good location and room setup
Summary: Overall it was very good, except i was disappointed about the staff service on the second day, The veranda needs more cleaning, I love the room setup. I will surely recommend for a family of 4. I love the location. It took us less than 15 minutes to Disneyland. Very beautiful and quite environment, My wife really love the room setup

We had a horrible experience here. They tell you the pool is open until 10pm but every night of our stay until 11pm people were crazy loud in pool, which faces directly at your room as the pool is in the center of complex. People remained in the courtyard partying until after midnight and it would have been longer had we not called security to ask them to quiet down. Rooms are VERY dated and rundown, the entire suite smelled like mildew and cigarettes. You can literally hear everyone from the outside hallway and all surrounding rooms, even though we were on top floor this did not help at all, and our entire family was awoken at 4am each day by loud noises in hall right outside our room window. Oh, and did I mention that for the largest suite there and being a family of 4, our

Didn't end up staying. Walked into the room. Saw a cockroach on the wall and turned and walked out. The refund was annoying also. The hotel had to refund Expedia and then Expedia refunded me. I guess that wasn't their fault but it put me in a pinch when I had to go find somewhere else to stay that night.

Me and my family recently stayed at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites in Anaheim Orange Ca and the room was a disaster.  My family and I booked the room 3 nights 7/24 thru 7/27/22 the room appeared to be cleaned but upon further investigation was definitely rushed thru. The hotel policy is anything over 2 nights you will not receive room refreshing of any type unless requested the day before, we reported that someone had vomited all over the chairs and couch inside the room. After reporting this issue the staff again relayed to us the policy and we said we understand under normal circumstances but with all the viruses and sickness in the air these days surely you could do something about this promptly. The on duty staff did nothing at all we couldn’t even get the staff

Everything was nice and clean. The staff was nice and helpful, and breakfast was also good. I didn't stay long enough to enjoy the pool but that was a bonus to have. I like how the pool was in the building but outdoor.  The beds were comfortable to sleep in and the location we stayed at was closed to all the places we needed to visit.

Summary Heading: Dirty, run down and had a giant roach in our room!
Summary: This hotel is very rundown, dirty and has roaches! None of us would walk around without our shoes on, I do not recommend staying here! In desperate need of an upgrade. Had to put our key card in the front door to turn on air conditioner, very strange setup.

I am not exaggerating. My family and I had a good, comfortable and safe stay here at Best Western for 4 days. The breakfast was great and our room was great. Thanks again Best Western.  We will most def be coming back to stay here

Stay experience was good no issues other than maybe some light dusting of the vents and surrounding walls , overall stay was satisfying and would definitely continue to use best western as I have been

Summary Heading: Nothing fancy, but I would come back
Summary: I stayed at this hotel while visiting friends in the area. I have stayed at other places, but really liked this location and felt it was safe. It was in an area with business. It was a quiet and clean area.   The room looked like it had been upgraded, but there were still things that they could clean better and work on. The breakfast was basic, but good. The staff worked hard to constantly try and refill things as it got really busy.    If I stayed here again I would requst a higher floor far from the breakfast buffet. I ended up having to wear ear plugs because once the breakfast was going in the mornings, I could loudly hear the beeping of the waffles machines, people talking and kids playing as the outdoor seating was right outside of my door.   Housekeeping is on requst

The staff was not friendly. Whenever we would leave or come back, no acknowledgement or hello or goodbye. They would just sit there looking down at the floor, each other, or their phones. There was only one working elevator. The gal at the front desk told me there was parking and an elevator near my room on the back side. So I unpack everything from my car and try to use it to find out it’s not working. So I had to carry everything around the hotel through the front. It was a mess. No cleaning service. Our carpet has a bunch of stains. Our couch has a burnt hole like from a cigarette, and had tears in it. The smell. It smelt like a sewer and dirty mop water was used to clean the floors, in the lobby and then really badly upstairs. Would not stay here ever again.

Summary Heading: Stay away from this very old property.  Its website misleading seriously
Summary: The one night of my stay was such a disaster, very bad experience.  Does not worth the money I paid. It's website describes the suite has a "full kitchen", free Wi-Fi, an 58sf suite with one q/b and f/safa b.  But its kitchen has zero pod, pan, fork, spoon, or kitchenware, I was unable to eat an incident noodles after a late arrival.  It has no wi-fi at all---absolutely no wi-fi, no matter paid or free, just no wi-fi.  The worker came, checked and told me some rooms in this hotel have a wi-fi box but some do not.  He saud my unit unfortunately has no wi-fi box coverage.  Though it describes having 2 beds, but only the Queen bed has blankets, the full size sofa bed has nothing.  It charges a lot of money, I want my money back because it does not worth the money.

Good room for short stay business trip.  The hallways were outside (motel like) and the elevator near my room was out of order.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  The computer & printer services were useful.

Stayed here Memorial Day weekend so it was busier than usual but our room and the hotel was clean. The breakfast was a great bonus offering a wide selection of food. We stayed in a king suite room. It was very spacious. The hotel was a little ways from the main attraction areas but was an easy Uber ride to anyway. The outlet mall is close by with lots of shops and restaurants. Short ride to the baseball stadium. Long beach and Huntington Beach about 30 minute drive away. We enjoyed our stay here and would stay here again.

Overall it was a good experience. Probably the nicest best western I’ve ever stayed at. Very good selection for breakfast and they kept bringing out fresh warm food until about 10 minutes before breakfast close but I saw the bring out a fresh plate of eggs to another guest who asked. Rooms was pretty clean, the tiles by our bathroom were a bit dirty though. 2 issues with our stay. 1- the smoke alarm battery started chirping during our first night so the next day we asked them to replace the battery, they didn’t have any batteries cause the maintenance guy was gone for the day I guess, so they asked if we wanted to keep it chirping in the room or have them just take it out. Probably a liability but I did op to just sleep without it that night. 2- the hotel ran out of towels for

This hotel is very roomy and comfortable. Equipped with a wet bar, refrigerator, microwave and 2 televisions made this BWPlus a plus for me. Only 2 drawbacks....1) tv channels are 4 numbers instead of 2 and no premium channels available. There are sufficient electric vehicle charging stalls but not Tesla compatible. Otherwise it's a nice hotel locat8close to the freeways and The Block at Orange.

The location of this hotel is great. We needed a quick convenient stay while visiting Disney parks. The rooms are very outdated but for one night it was fine. Unfortunately our AC didn't work which made for a very restless night and the water pressure in the shower and the sinks were next to little water.   Front desk went above and beyond. Zenaida is a sweetheart and she was so attentive and went the extra mile to make sure we were happy. I would come back here just for the service we had. Thanks so much!

There was black mold and blood specks in the bathroom. The hotel tried to paint over the blood but did not get it all covered. The staff didn’t even care or the manager did not care to try and correct the issues.

Very close to freeways and outlet mall with several restaurants.  Pleasant courtyard area.  Counter area with sink is outside toilet/shower room and rooms are not small.  Hotel was busy but we had no trouble finding parking or a table for breakfast.

Summary Heading: Great proximity to attractions, Fair rates. That’s it.
Summary: 3 stars are for the proximity to the attractions (Disneyland) and rates. Easy to find, has complimentary hot breakfast. Outdated, AC did not work and got pushback when trying to report problem to front desk. Room had odor and broken appliances. Poor guest service. You get what you pay for, I guess.

Please do not waste your time, and money at this hotel. The room was dark, bathroom & vent poor quality. The pool was unclean. Food was low quality.  And worst of all service was negative, poor, unprofessional.

This room was satisfactory and I would probably stay there again with the exception of the screen on the air conditioning panel that was broken which made it impossible for us to adjust. Made for a very hot and uncomfortable night.

Don’t be fooled by the photos of the lobby. This place is depressing and many things in the room didn’t work, including the phones. Pillows were the size of a seat cushion. We reserved for 3 but towels or pillows for the third person were not in the room. We went to the front to get them but bath towels ran out so we got a bunch of hand towels. A/C didn’t work well.

I had a great stay here while visiting Disneyland. The staff was fantastic. The room was perfect for my family. Would have liked to have silverware and dishes in the room though. The bath tub drained very slow and the shampoo dispenser was out. But the front desk supplied me with plenty of toiletries when I asked.

The employees were fantastic and so helpful. I needed more towels and an extra blanket and it was to me with 10 mins of my call. The pool and hot tub were great. Furniture a little 70 themed, still nice.

My favorite location, staff was very professional, courteous, attentive to my needs and accommodating to my request for early check-in after a long drive from Las Vegas. Very much appreciate the efforts and service provided by the staff. Kudos to all of you.

The room I wanted wasn’t ready but the gentleman at the front desk was able to accommodate me without charging me extra. The room itself was clean and spacious. I’ve stayed here before and will stay here in the future.

This hotel seems off the beaten path, but really it’s 10 minute drive to Disneyland,  20 minutes from Laguna Beach, an outlet mall down the road and a Krispy creme donuts around the corner, lots of restaurants near by.  Pretty quiet place to stay

Summary Heading: OK Place to rest your head
Summary: We stayed for 6 nights. The hotel outside and pool area was very nice. The location is nice too. Our room on the other hand was just ok. I try not to be to picky. Our fridge door was rusted on the bottom and on the side. Use of the kitchen drawers were not plausible due to the fact the were broken. Then full kitchen comes with no cooking utensils, plates, cups, nothing. The carpet was spliced together and coming up in sections and our feet would get black from walking barefoot. We didn’t have enough towels for 4 people even after asking for more. We were told we were owed more, never got them. The water was just warm. Pressure was ok. The room had lots of patch jobs they didn’t hold up. The sheets and towels are rough. If you just want a place to crash this would be ok.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel in a great location!
Summary: Best Western lodgings are a dependable choice and this location is no exception.  Great centralized location for visiting area attractions.  We had concert tickets at the Honda Center and visited the Christ Cathedral as well, but this inn is also great for a visit to Disneyland, Angel Stadium, and the Anaheim Convention Center as well.  Nice, clean facility at a reasonable price.  Also appreciated their zero tolerance policy for noise and smoking.  Complementary breakfast was very good.

We stayed here 3 years ago and it was pretty good so we came back. This time the air conditioning didn't work in our first room so they moved us to a second room (after we had to put up a fight to be moved). The AC didn't work well in the second room the first night, but it wasn't 83 like it was in the first room so we stayed. Then the AC stopped working all together and the maintenance man's response was that sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't so there was nothing they could do. The first room had stains all over the floor and the second room had a broken closet. They never cleaned our room or took out our trash during our entire stay, which led to trash lining the hallway in the morning because that was the only way your trash would get emptied. Also, they don't offer

Needs some renovations but is spacious with a nice courtyard and pool. Clean, friendly staff and a great manager who is willing to explain and make things right. It’s worth $140-175/night but when asking over $200; it’s a bit high since it’s older (1970s feel) The suite is spacious, and bed is very comfortable. Just needs new furniture and bathroom renovation.

Summary Heading: Pool and hot tub closed by health department
Summary: The main reason for choosing this hotel was the pool and hot tub which were closed by the health department with no signs of reopening anytime soon.  Staff was not very concerned with the problems we reported.  room was not cleaned or restocked during our entire 7 day stay.

I highly recommend this Bestwestern. We will definitely stay there again. Great breakfast, clean rooms, pool, hot tub, comfy bed, and close to shopping and food. Short drive to Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. Great place for families. We had a large family in the room next to us and we never heard them!

The suites are wonderful and affordable. They are bigger then some one bedroom apartments. Very comfortable  if your traveling with kids or others. If you drive by this hotel you would think it was an office building. I've  driven by it for years and never knew it existed.

Very disappointed with how bad this hotel has gone down hill & the lack of professionalism from the staff starting with the head of management Rosie Mohr. A lot of inconsistencies, really hoped this stay around would be better.

In short, we were checked into a room that had already been given away. The room was clean so we did not know until the other guests tried to get in the room and were totally freaked out we were in it....   Hotel management kept us in the room and relayed the message through the other guests.   at 2AM an un uniformed hotel security knocked on our door until we answered and told us our room was listed as vacant...  obviously this is all a MAJOR safety issue and we left in the morning, losing money and our reservation.  the hotel has been unresponsive and unapologetic.

Summary Heading: Don't get FOOL by the Pictures.  Cheap quality and dirty.
Summary: Horrible Hotel. This hotel is not even worth a $30 motel quality. Don't get fool by their Lobby pictures. behind the Lobby rooms are very old and dirty. I stayed 4 days and not a single day we got house keeping services. They put covid excuses for not cleaning their rooms for 4 straight days. Their bathroom is nasty and old. Rooms are cold and you can hear noise from next room people talking and beds and bedsheets are like dirty old cheap rags. Receptionists and employees are rude and ignorant too. never again

Summary Heading: Good Value for a Two Room Suite
Summary: It's always nice to have a two room suite, and for the price we paid for one here, it was an excellent value. Overall the property is kept up well, and secure. The room was clean, although the bathroom could use a little sprucing up (some mold on the ceiling). But overall, I'd recommend - especially to families on a budget.

Summary Heading: $100 deposit? Really? Elite members shouldn’t have to pay for that nonsense!
Summary: $100 deposit? Really? Elite members shouldn’t have to pay for that nonsense!I plis no pets? If I’d bring had brought him, it’s not they’d know! My dogs tell trained and doesn’t make any noise, plus the $4.00 laundry? No thanks!

Thank you to the great staff who made my stay a wonderful one. Thom was very kind and very helpful. Thank you so much. I am looking forward to returning in a week for work. Happy new year and God bless

So I got in around 5ishp.m and I was met with a friendly guy named Thom Lomboy , he was supper friendly and helpful, I hadn't had time to eat all day being with work and traveling to my destination, And not being Familiar with the area Thom gave me a couple suggestions of places to grab a bite to eat either sit down  or drive through, he made my night !!!

Would NOT recommend this hotel. Upon arrival, we were not greeted. Front desk was rude. Hotel does not have housekeeping, you will need to go to the front desk for towels, blankets, pillows, etc. Mold/mildew, rust in bathroom. Cracks on the ceiling. Breakfast was bare minimum. Not worth what we paid.
Manager Response: Dear TLoveFamily84,  We are gutted to know that your recent stay at our property was not up to the mark. On behalf of our entire staff, please accept our sincere apologies. We take feedback very seriously, and please be ensured that we will work on your concerns diligently so that no other guest experiences what you did. We have briefed our housekeeping staff, and we will ensure a more stringent approach from here on, especially when it comes to enhancing our regular quality checks. We would hate to lose a valued guest like you and we sincerely hope you will give us another chance to host you better.

Summary Heading: Had a terrible experience in the property
Summary: I was being told by one of the front desk staff that I could pay later when I check out for 1 day extension later in the middle of the night the security knocked my doors and asked me to vacate the house. They do not even have sufficient food in breakfast. Everyone should avoid this property
Manager Response: Dear pinakidsutapa,  Thank you for your review. Please accept our deepest apology for the inconvenience you encountered during your stay. I regret to hear of your dissatisfaction with our breakfast service and the condition of the hotel during your most recent stay with us!   Our primary goal is to provide all guests with an enjoyable experience and it is troubling to know that you faced such an unusual experience. We take this quite highly and your feedback will be shared with management so that appropriate steps can be taken. Thank you again for taking the time for sharing this experience and for your valuable business.

Summary: Very nice place. Staff was very friendly and helpful. We were in the suite which we were not expecting. Very large and accommodating. This is not a complaint, only a suggestion: when you exit the elevators, make it less confusing to find your room. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Hi NormWms,   Thank you very much for your great review of our hotel! We appreciate your compliments and we take high pride in the peaceful ambiance that we can provide to our guests as well as to our friendly and helpful staff. We hope to see you stay with us more in the future as we promise to push our services better to provide you with the most pleasant stay that you can find. We thank you that you highlighted our strengths in your review. May you return again soon and feel comfortable just like the last time!

Summary: This hotel appears nice from the exterior photos, but upon arrival is more like a converted motel. The rooms have a dated remodel, and while clean and functional, the decor is tired and predictable.  Breakfast service was repetitive with no fruit or grab-and-go type items.  The walls are paper thin. Hearing neighbors should be expected.  The Internet did not service the entire hotel. If you are there for business, request a room with a strong signal. I was advised that my poor and intermittent connection may be due to weather. It rained one day in the six days I was there, the remaining days were 70 degrees or higher. I had to leave my room and walk the halls to get connection to send/receive data.  For the few moments I was able to relax, a simple TV channel guide would have
Manager Response: Dear tsgreen1974,  I am sorry your stay did not meet our standards. Please rest assured that we will work toward resolving the issues you had during your stay in order to prevent them from happening again in the future especially with the condition of the hotel, internet service and the cleanlines during your most recent stay with us. I want to personally thank you for staying at our hotel and hope you will return to stay with us again in the future. Have a great day!

Summary Heading: Nice property.  Rooms are in serious need of updates.
Summary: This property would NOT issue a receipt for my one night stay since I booked my room thru a third party. Especially interesting since front desk staff asked me repeatedly for my email address to send my receipt upon checkout. If I paid them $$, why the heck can they NOT issue an emailed receipt?  Also tv in living area did not work; thermostat did not work. Couches were disgusting, severely stained and very lumpy. Yuck. Beds were comfy but attached living area was purposely avoided and useless.  Room 206
Manager Response: Hi ATO61,  Thank you for taking the time to share your fair and honest feedback as we are always looking for ways to grow and improve. We sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced with our front desk staff and the cleanliness during your most recent stay with us. We do not take comments like these lightly, and I have informed our Team of your feedback to ensure situations like these do not happen again.

Summary: I love this hotel!  The staff is friendly and helpful.  They always make me feel welcome.  I stay here sometimes just because the rooms are big and the beds are comfortable.  I love their breakfast....and Frank, the manager, is amazing.  I feel safe at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the response. I am humbled for the name mentions. It was good to hear that you were pleased with our stay. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Felt welcome from the minute I walked in the doors to check-in. Frank did and excellent job at making sure me and my four little one's were well informed of the amenities that the best Western meridian has to offer. I was pleasantly surprised to see a HOT breakfast the next morning. The pool was perfect temperature and the room was nice and cozy .Will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the perfect review. We are pleased that you enjoyed out hot breakfast. Hope to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites.

Summary Heading: Only 6 miles from Disneyland and better prices
Summary: We always stay here when we go to Disneyland it is only about 6 miles from the park. The prices are lower than the ones close to the park. The rooms are great. The pool area is very nice. Breakfast is also part of the package. this time the breakfast could of been better. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Any issues we had were taken care of right away. We have stayed here many times and we will return again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments. We recently opened our breakfast and will surely have more items in the future.

Summary: There were no trash cans, they asked you to leave your trash by the door and they’d get it. When we returned at the end of the day the front door was covered in ants, and ants were in our room. They did nothing about it and acted inconvenienced by being asked to come take it away. Lack of basic amenities like towels, toliet paper and sheets/blankets for the sofa bed.
Manager Response: Sorry that your stay was not satisfactory. We thank you for the comments as this will help us improve our hotel.

Summary: i had a great time here. The staff from security to the general manager were all nice and helpful. Thanks to frank, glenn, xen, and the 2 security guards for all thier help. When askedbabout the area they were knowledgeable.
Manager Response: Hi loaners2021,  We are exceptionally thankful that you have honored our staff members with praiseworthy words. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and are happy to hear you had a great experience with us.  Our staff is highly trained to give you an exceptional experience, and we are very pleased to learn that we achieved this goal during your recent stay. We only wish to give nothing but the best service to our guests, and to know that we have accomplished such goal gives us great joy.

Summary: Super nice front desk receptionist had a problem with my first room told him about my issue he gladly without a issue gave me a another room to stay in. Quite, clean room ! Always enjoy my stays here would recommend (:
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review. We value the kind words and will make sure your next stay would be magnificent. Hope to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Plus.

Summary: Our room was 339 , This hotel is old and dirty it needs to be update fast. The carpet was dirty, it had no shampoo/conditioner I had to go downstairs to get it. I am sorry but I feel embarrassed that I took my family to stay in this hotel. The worst thing was there was a RAT in our room! We left some bananas on the kitchen table and when we came back from Disneyland  a banana was on the floor and it looked like a rat bit it. The whole family trip was nice except our hotel stay, so pay a little extra and stay in a better and cleaner place please!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the Candid review. We appreciate the comments and this will help us improve our hotel.

Summary: Staff was very friendly & always helpful.  Great location, close to dining, shopping and freeway.  Parking was convenient & we were always able to park close to an entry door.  Lobby was welcoming an well decorated.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review. We appreciate your comments and hope to see you again.

Summary: Great experience and a lovely hotel. Room was exceptional and staff was friendly. Shoutout to Chase, thank you sir for all the help.   The room was clean, bathroom was nice. Everything was working fine and it was a great stay
Manager Response: Thank you for the comment about our hotel being great as well as the shout out to Chase. He will be pleased with the kind words. See you again at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites.

Summary: I love staying at this Best Western & always get a suite. The rooms are always very clean, spacious, & extremely quiet. And I just can’t say enough about the wonderful staff that is always helpful should you need anything at all! They are so happy to go the extra step to take care of you! I have already made my next reservation to come back to this wonderful hotel.
Manager Response: We value the cleanliness of the hotel As we have the Best Western We Care Clean project. Hope to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites in Orange Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Frank and the crew are the very best!! Just outstanding treatment!
Summary: Frank and the crew are the very best!! Just simply outstanding. They will tend to your every need. The pillows and the beds are super comfy. The showers are great as well. Soap dispensaries are easy and convenient in the shower. All hotels should have the dispensaries set up like this. I have stayed at this hotel many many times and it is fantanstic! Thumbs up!
Manager Response: Dear Kevin thank you for the 5 star review and for the beautiful comment about outstanding treatment. We will REMEMBER you and give treat you like royalty when you return to us.

Summary: hotel is outdated, no friendly staff, bugs above sink vanity area, tile base inside the bathroom coming out and you can whole on wall. i did not tell front desk bc there is NO point of tell them due NO hospitality service when we arrived. lobby smell so bad when we were leaving next morning.
Manager Response: Our apologies that your stay was not satisfactory. Sad to say we were not informed of the situation while you were still here and we could have resolved the problem.

Summary: When we checked in we had reserved 3 separate rooms.  The front seat check in lady was very confrontational and rude when answering questions about the rooms. When we checked in the refrigerator was broken and would not stay closed, but that was not our biggest problem.  THERE WAS A SANATIZED RIBBON ON THE TOILET SEAT THAT I REMOVED TO FIND URINE ALL OVER THE SEAT AND FLOOR. When I contacted the front desk and spoke to the same woman at check in I was told there are no other rooms and that the manager was at lunch and would call me back later.  She was very rude and didn't even offer to have someone come clean the room.  I got a call back from the manager who proceeded to offer me rewards points, but never offered to come have the room cleaned until I asked to have our cleaned
Manager Response: My sincerest apologies for your inconvenience. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will surely speak to our staff internally. Again our apologies.

Summary: We canceled the room weeks before the check-in date due to the entry ban, but they still took money from our account. Even though it was free cancellation. Does not respond to emails, has sent several. Going forward with this via booking.com now. Does not feel like they should belong to the best western group.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear your experience was less than satisfactory and apologize for any inconveniences experienced. Please feel free to contact us at frank@bwpmeridian.com we would like to obtain additional information so we may remedy the issues described.

Summary: Me and my family had a really good stay here and the staff was excellent. They really made us feel welcomed. I would stay here again. 100% recommend for you and your friends and family. They keep the place spotless.
Manager Response: We appreciate that comment about our staff being excellent as well at the 100% recommendation. We hope to see you again. We always remember people giving us perfect reviews and to make sure your next stay would be perfect!

Summary: The first room ac didn’t work, smelled like poop! It looked like somebody threw up on the carpet. Torn furniture. Next room had toilet paper in the toilet and a French fry on the floor. That’s clean? Never again!
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.  Sincerely,  Frank A. Guest Service Manager

Summary: The stay for me this time was the worse. My room was never cleaned. I ask about the garbage and was told...there is a trash can at the front you can use. Also, this room had no hairdryer. This did not feel like home. This was my go to home away from home. Never again will I stay here.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear your recent stay was less than satisfactory and apologize for any inconveniences experienced during your visit. We take this matter seriously and will definitely take care of the issue. Again our sincerest apologies.

Summary: Pros: Felt safe and was quiet. Rooms are spacious. Interior rooms face the pool courtyard.   Cons: Aggressive messages around hotel about kicking out smokers(we aren't smokers, but still). No breakfast or even an attempt to offer a to-go option. We had to make a grocery run to pick up supplies after checking in and finding no breakfast would be served. Not even coffee.  Suites have cabinets and counter space, but there is no way to prepare a breakfast.Not a bowl, glass, plate, flatware or dishsoap.  We were placed in a room that did NOT have their put-your-card-in-the-slot to operate the thermostat. We later found out this was the only way to adjust the thermostat. When I couldn't turn on the air conditioner, I was told to put my room key in the (nonexistent) slot. The security
Manager Response: Our sincerest apologies for your inconvenience. We appreciate you writing a review and rest assured we take all comments in a constructive manner to improve our hotel. Thank you for your stay.

Summary: Memos everywhere of required mask mandate, however, staff seemed to think it’s optional. Pretty lobby, outdated rooms. Breakfast is not served..but is still advertised during booking on their site. Not worth the value of the stay. Update your rooms, clean your sheets(I had other peoples hair particles in the bed)
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We value your feedback and take all matters seriously.

Summary: Although there was no breakfast, it was still a very nice hotel, close to shops, restaurants, etc. Saw fireworks from Angel Stadium, within walking distance to Orange Outlets Mall, restaurants. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful comments.

Summary: this hotel is easy to find, in a quite area. close to stores and restaurants. check in was fast and easy. staff was very polite and helpful. room was spacious and clean. beds were comfortable. pool area was clean, hot tub near the pool. very nice court yard to sit out in.
Manager Response: Thank you for the perfect review.

Summary Heading: Great location but a dirty hotel room
Summary: The negatives: - The room was dirty with the exception of the bed. - Furniture was in poor condition - They do not offer the breakfast that was advertised on their web site, and I am looking at the modified one. We have stayed at many hotels throughout the pandemic and a water/cookie does not do it. - Gym was closed with no indication on web site.  The positives: + Great location in terms of being close to Anaheim attractions, but you'll need a car. + The hotel was quiet. + Seemed pretty safe. + Parking is free.  Overall this is a dirty hotel and one of the worst I have stayed at in terms of cleanliness and maintenance of the furniture. The only upside in that respect was the bed was clean, and the only reason I stayed one night.
Manager Response: Thank for commenting on the cleanliness our bed. Although I apologize that your stay was not satisfactory.

Summary: I checked in and went to my room to find that someone had been laying on the bed, and left a half of a still cold 24oz beer on the night stand.  In a quick scan I found nothing in the closet, but that the toilet had been used.  I called then went back to the front desk and insisted on another room.  They stated that '...it was probably the pool guy or one of the facilities workers that did it...'  I would consider that a rather cavalier answer for a very serious employee/security issue.  I didn't have the option to find another hotel that late in the evening and took the different room.  The other room was clean and comfortable and what you would expect.  I still believe they have a serious issue that management should deal with.
Manager Response: Thank you for the candid review. We value your feed back and take your comments seriously. Thank you for your time in posting a review.

Summary: Needs new towels, replace faucet at sink, fix exhaust fan in bathroom. Noise from outside and from room to room was a lot. Room fixtures dated. Poor tech support.  No breakfast available and it was not reflected in a discount. Breakfast was listed as included when booked on Best Western web site.
Manager Response: Our sincerest apologies that we did not meet your expectations. We value your feed back and take all matters seriously. Thank you for taking the time to post a review.

Summary: Very nice rooms just not clean enough to satisfy the customers there was dust on the floors and stains on the sheets but the service was good and nice room set up despite the few things that were wrong
Manager Response: Thank you for the 4 star review and we appreciate the comments that you made. This helps us out to improve our hotel. Thank you.

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel since 2011 every time I am in California. They have remodeled the lobby since and it’s extremely fast check in. I would highly recommend. Suites are accommodating and serve its purpose
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review. We will remember you and make sure the next time you come in you are treated like royalty.

Summary: We had such a good time last te at this hotel that my daughter asked to return to it and so we did, except this time was all bad, at check in we were told no breakfast and no pool available even though at the moment of booking through THE BEST WESTERN website it stated full breakfast included  and pool available, since it was late and after a long road trip i decided to say ok and just ask for a discount wich they said no, i felt i was lied to, but we were tired so we stayed anyway, next day i asked for ONE more towel, again i was told no, thats no way to treat a repited client
Manager Response: Our sincerest apologies that your stay was unsatisfactory.  We appreciate your comments and take all matters seriously. Thank you for posting a review.

Summary: A map of the facility and instructions on how to get to our room from the attendant at the front desk would've been nice. It's a large hotel, and the team member at the front desk gave us the impression our room was up the elevator and down the hall. In reality, we were on the other side of the facility and we got lost. We had to ask a security guard where our room was. In a large hotel like this, we should've been shown where our room was on a map and shown where to park our car near our room. No instructions like that were given. The room was less than impressive: stuffy with not adequate circulation. One narrow window for the entire room--even with the air conditioner, it was unsatisfactory. The dresser was off-balance, and one of the drawers wouldn't say closed. The bathtub
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We value your feed back and take matters seriously.

Summary: Hotel review  This is a very odd hotel. We stayed here for 4 nights while our home was being remodeled. The pictures and description on the website is misleading.  Overall the hotel (at least our room) was not bad. It was clean and very large. The bed was comfortable enough. Enjoyed having doors to separate rooms as hubby and I both were working from the room. Great area in kitchen to work.  Wifi was good.  Room was very quiet. Small fridge and a microwave.  AC was great!  Very close to Angels Stadium, OC Outlets (Block of Orange), and Disney. Close freeway access. We enjoyed our stay here and might stay here again.   The room was very dated. The carpet is newer but the rest of the room and furniture are very old. The building itself is odd, it is either an old office building
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We appreciate your comments and take all matters seriously.

Summary: What a wonderful hotel! So clean, Front Desk and GM were so nice.The room decor is beautiful. The Hotel is a very nice place to take your family for your next vacation! They have a nice pool and gum area.
Manager Response: Thank you for the perfect review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Our room was pretty typical, but upon walking in it smelled of rubbing alcohol. There were red stains on the carpet next to the bed and in the bathtub. The air conditioner was very loud. Lighting was dark in the restroom, and the restroom door was very difficult to close. There was also a build up of dirt on the baseboards and ledges above the windows. Also, the vending machines were broken, breakfast was not being served, and although the pool was filled and beautiful, guests were not allowed to use it (outdoors and post-covid restrictions).
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and apologize for your inconvenience. Thank you for posting a review. We value your feed back.

Summary: Charged a full breakfast when I reserved the room, but served a granola bar and a water bottle for wrap and go breakfast. No money back. Front desk person said I can cancelled the room if I don’t like.
Manager Response: We are truly sorry to hear you did not enjoy your stay with us and sincerely apologize for the issues experienced. We do value and appreciate your honest feedback and thank you for bringing these important issues to our attention so that we may address them accordingly with our hotel team and improve in these areas.

Summary: Stay away. I called to confirm all the amenities were in play and was told of course they are. The Big Lie. This supposed plus hotel was the only plus in a 25 mile radius with no amenities. No room cleaning was the worst. They would not even bring up clean towels too, I had  take the towels to the front desk ( they counted them) to get clean ones.
