THIS IS NO LONGER A BW PLUS!!!!! 3 day stay and not even ar least vacuum the floor. Breakfast was a warm water and a hard granola bar but sure did charge you full price.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet your expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.

Summary: I was very disappointed with room and staff at this so called hotel. By far the worst experience I've had at any hotel especially a Best Western. The noise on the 1st floor was unbearable as was the smell of the room. The chair in the room was some nasty dirty that I would not sit in it to save my life.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear your recent stay was less than satisfactory and apologize for any inconveniences experienced during your visit. Thank you for taking the time to post a comment.

Summary: Came into town for another week and BW was my first choice. They yet again reminded me why they will forever be my first choice. Great customer service, Frank the general manager was very welcoming and made sure that I was taken care of. Thank you staff, thank you Frank  See you soon
Manager Response: Thank you for your humbling review. We will make sure that when you come back you are treated like a king! We are glad that you appreciate our service and our beautiful clean and sanitized rooms. We hope to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites Orange/Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Terrible, will not stay here again
Summary: First room had not been cleaned, and had drugs dropped on the floor by the closet. Desk staff was extremely un professional when I got him to pay attention to me. The second room was better, but not by too much. At least no drugs on the floor. Trach was emptied, and furniture appeared to be wiped down. Unbelievable anyone stays here for business.
Manager Response: Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience. I understand your frustrations and we value all guest feed backs. We will do our best so that your experience will not be repeated again.

Summary: My family loved this hotel not the first time that we stayed there but this one was very disappointed carpet looked disgusting same as the couch dirty bathroom hair in the floors ,I hope they can get back to the high standards because the rooms are amazing for a family trip
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review, We value your feed backs and we take this matter seriously. Thank you for your comments.

Summary Heading: All around best experience I've had in a hotel
Summary: I have stayed here often and if I could I would give 7 stars the staff is helpful attentive and friendly Frank is the best I'm so pleased with my experience here and recommend anyone coming to the Anaheim orange area to come here for lodging.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind words and we are glad you were pleased with the service of our staff. We hope to see you again soon at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites Orange Anaheim.

Summary Heading: The Best Western that bested the rest!
Summary: To start off, I need to mention that not only this month, but EVERY month for the past year ( the pandemic year I should call it) I stay at least 3 to 5 days.  So this isn't a one time thing' or a show that was put on, were talking consistent excellence, consistently 😀 Starting with Jimmy, the permanent up-beat, sincere smile that you will encounter at the front desk.  This young man seemingly would have no limitations when it comes to customer satisfaction, fortunately there's never been a reason for me to actually complain.... But with whatever needs  ( more like demand before I've had coffee 😐)  but with whatever it is I do mention, the manager Frank , has literally never failed to amaze !  And when I bring up this staff, we all have to remember we are talking during
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words regarding Jimmy. I will pass this message along to him and he would surely be pleased. I am happy that you find your stay with us exemplary. Hope to see you again on your next travel to our area.

Summary: the best western always goes above and beyond for there guest to always insure there comfort and safety. i have no complaints  and could not have had a better stay. the staff are always friendly and helpful. thank best western
Manager Response: Your review is highly appreciated and we thank you for the kinds words. Our staff always strive to do their best to please all the guests. We hope to see you again on your next travel to Orange County

Summary: Was quoted a larger room (a suite) than I received but the front desk would not refund me any of my money when I brought it to their attention. Price was too high considering there was no pool, spa, breakfast, laundry room, ice machines broken. But most of the staff were very pleasant and helpful. Rooms were clean
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review.

Summary: Jimmy & Frank are excellent with their leadership, professionalism & customer service. Words cannot express my appreciation for their efforts in going above and beyond for my family, business associates, and I. The staff from the maintenance individuals to house keeping are genuine, hard working individuals, and we are all grateful for their friendliness and efforts. 5 stars all the way around. Good people and great service. Thank you
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words. We always strive to make sure all our guests have a great experience at our hotel. We hope to see you again at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites.

Summary Heading: Favorite best Western location to stay !!
Summary: I travel Alot with my husband for his work and  I absolutely love staying at this specific location. It is by far my favorite hotel let alone the most amazing Best Western to stay at .  Frank the manager is the best and most helpful hotel manager I have ever delt with. The rooms are spacious, beautiful,  and the price is unbeatable when it comes to having a suite with a full kitchen. Would recommend staying here with 5 plus stars !!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites Orange Anaheim! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed the service received from our friendly staff and found our guestrooms to be comfortable. Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: Hotel is well managed and great location
Summary: Our family loves this hotel for it's location and great staff. It's location is close to everything we need around the area. Doordash also delivers so it makes our stay much more enjoyable when we feel the need to stay in.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you had a good stay and found our staff to be accommodating. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites in Orange Anaheim. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary: I couldn't wrote enough amazing things about this place. Frank(the gm) has treated myself, my lady, and our boys like family. We all hate check out day when we stay here.  From my countless stays for work in different hotels around the country I was left with a poor view on pretty much all hotels from staff to hospitality. This is truly the last hotel on earth that is genuine, caring, and helpful. There isn't enough space to wrote all the good experiences. I'll never EVER stay at another hotel in this state as long as frank is still there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you back again in the future.

Summary Heading: The hands down best hotel all around
Summary: This place is absolutely awesome fro. The maintenance all the way to the manager Frank. What good people they are. Kind welcoming and very accommodating. They helped me and my family when no one else would. The amount of joy they have from their guests is great. It's quiet and clean always. Very professional.   But very welcoming. It's southern charm at its best. Frank ,bill, Jimmy thank you all for the hospitality. I will repay your kindness for sure. Thank you so much. And God bless you all.
Manager Response: We are please with your kind words and for giving us a perfect review. You are the type of guests that all hotel's would like to have. Hoping to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites Orange Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Hotel not like how it use to be
Summary: We have been staying at this hotel for years. It’s our go to especially when we go to Disneyland because the location is so close. However, this last visit was very disappointing. When we checked in and went to the room it smelled like smoke and looked very run down and was nothing like the past rooms we have stayed in before . I am not one to complain so we tried to stay in there. We just came in from a long drive so I needed to use the restroom. After that we just couldn’t take the smoke smell so I decided to go back to front desk and see if I can change the room. Please keep in mind, we checked in, got our bags from the car, walked to find our room, used the restroom, five mins and the smell of smoke was too much for us and my two small kids and walked back down to the
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review. I understand your frustration and I apologize for the inconvenience. We take all matter seriously and rest assured we will be handling your issue internally with our staff.

Summary Heading: 3rd time and still a great value
Summary: The beds are super comfortable. The rooms are crazy quiet. It is near a freeway but you would never know based on the soundproofing. No breakfast left us shocked. There is no excuse and COVID is no longer a valid excuse. This was the 5th BW hotel for us in the same week in the same state (CA) and all of them offered breakfast.  That being said we will still return again and again but at some point management just looks like they are using COVID as an excuse to skimp. BW Plus status may end up being downgraded.
Manager Response: Thank you for posting a review. Rest assured your comments are taken seriously. We to see you again.

Summary Heading: Used to be a great place to stay.
Summary: We have stayed at this hotel a lot in the past because it was a great hotel and a really good value, but after this last time there, we probably will not be back.  The staff are not bad, but not great, and I'm ok with that, but you can tell with all the signs up that if there is any cussing at the staff you will be kicked out that this place is not doing great.  Now with the pandemic, I understand thigs and amenities may be closed/not available, but thats no excuse for to overall quality of the hotel to decline, no hot breakfast, ok, but the "grab n go" breakfast is a Costco bottle of watrer and a Costco granola bar.  I have stayed at several other Best Westerns that do a much better job at the grab n go .  The room was cleaned to a good level, but there were no bath/wash towels
Manager Response: We appreciate your candid review. We are aware of your comments and will surely do our best to make guests stay as pleasant and satisfactory. We take all matters seriously and your suggestions and comments are taken as a priority. We hope to see you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Frank - GM

Summary Heading: Clean room but Perimeter of Hotel Need cleanlyness
Summary: The 2nd room was in good working condition,  but I feel that the perimeter of the Whole Hotel could be more Clean and Secure. My stay was very quiet and relaxing after we had to switch room due to slight Maintenance issues.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review. We appreciate your comments and we hope to see you again.

Summary: This hotel was so stained and filthy, I thought I was staying at a 30 minute hotel in Long Beach.  Had 3 rms.  All the same.  After complaining and changing arms, the staff was nice and accommodating, but how many arms do you need to know the whole place is a trash hole.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid comments. We appreciate your time to post a review and thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Frank the GM and Jimmy at the front desk are excellent and go above and beyond. I respect their attention to detail and customer service tremendously. In fact everyone who works there from house cleaning to maintenance has provided excellent service with such positive and friendly attitudes. This is a go to spot for me in Orange County for sure. Thank you all and stay safe
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a perfect review and for the kind words. Clients like you make our job enjoyable. We hope to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Plus Orange/Anaheim.

Summary: I booked this place because it was a Best Western Plus. Thinking it had higher standards because of its Plus rating. The plus is for the many infectious diseases you could contact by staying here. The door knobs were crusty as well as countertops in the VIP suite. Unidentified body fluids all over the bathroom. Some one elses hair in the bed. Dirty tile as well as the closet door guide rails that had a thick dry substance on it. I was shown and upgraded 3 times within an hour. Each room progressively more disgusting. We left immediately, Do not stay here unless you would like to become ill. Definetly NOT COVID SAFE.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.  Sincerely,  Frank A.

Summary Heading: More like a motel than a hotel.
Summary: The hotel looks like it used to be an office building and is in fact surrounded by office buildings in an odd location that isn't really near anything except the highway.  I would consider this more like a motel than hotel.  It was cheap (around $89/night on Booking.com) but I still expect it to be clean.  We had so many issues with our room that we had to move.  The front desk staff (Jimmy and Chase) were exceptional and accommodating.  The hallways were so full of litter and we never saw anyone vacuuming in the 4 days we were there.  There is a small strip mall across the parking lot with a taco restaurant and a few blocks down is a 7-11 convenience store (no gas) but other than that there is nothing around there.  I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your time to post a review. We appreciate your comments.

Summary: I have been staying here at the Best Western plus meridian in Orange for about 2 months already and I must say that I get sad on the 28th day when I have to check out for a day and make sure I have a reservation to come back ASAP the staff there are all very polite they have patients great customer service the rooms are very clean and I'm very much satisfied thank you Best Western for making my family and I feel like home and Frank and Jimmy and Bill the maintenance guy they're all awesome thank you guys
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review. We hope to see you again soon at the Best Western Meridian Plus Orange Anaheim.

Summary Heading: 1st day experience set tone for my whole stay.
Summary: First off I could never thank frank and his staff enough, I appreciate you all from the bottom of my heart. I had the rear passenger window busted out the night before I came here, Frank called my room the 1st morning to inform me my window was down. I informed him of it being broken out he offered to cover it up for me as I had tools and clothes in there. They put such care into it that I may never fix the window ;) just kidding. But seriously this staff had no reason to care about my car or belongings but they did. I’d recommend this place to any and everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your response. We are glad that we were able to help you in the little things we can do. We appreciate your kind comments and hope to see you again at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites Orange Anaheim.  Sincerely, Frank

Summary: Beds were comfy, liked the living room area, other guest left trash outside door, which stayed there for at least 12 hours. Carpets need serious cleaning or replacement. Other wise everything else was clean and we were comfortable with our children there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for taking the time to post a review. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had a great stay at this Best Western Plus! Frank was so joyful and willing to answer any questions we had. He goes above and beyond on his job! Also, all pens to sign paperwork with and room keys are sanatized between each use. They keep the property up to date and very clean! Give this place and this experience 5 stars!
Manager Response: That was a beautiful comment that you posted. We will be preparing for your next arrival at the Best Western Meridian Inn and Suites Orange Anaheim.

Summary: I was placed in room 342 and there’s a guy next door holding a big joint of weed and smell of weed is occasion defected. I think he may be selling something. There were people standing outside side entrance waiting for someone to let them in. They looked lost and up to no good.   This place has become shady since the last time I stayed. The facility is no longer as clean as before. The doors to cabinets was broken and there’s a big slit in the sofa.  The air condition was blowing on one side of the bed making it difficult for everyone to be comfortable. There’s bugs and ants all over in the kitchen and bathroom.   Definitely wouldn’t recommend this to any of my friends and family. Too bad this will be my last day as I will be coming back to this location or maybe any Best
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.  Sincerely,  Frank A.

Summary: 12night stay.  Room is good for the rate.  Due to pandemic that the following are non-operational - pool, gym, washer/dryer.  I also do not consider a bottle of water and a granola bar as breakfast:). Room services are suspended and you will have to go to the front office and gather your toiletries mostly every other day (some days they ran out but quickly re-ups later part of the day).  The room can be cleaned if you request for it.  Go with the GM (Frank), he has exceptional customer service skills and will make sure your stay will be pleasant.
Manager Response: Thank you for the warm comments and we hope to see you again.

Summary: We have stayed @ this Property before- but it’s the hospitality of Frank that REALLY has me hooked to stay again👍🏻💘.  I’m a Diamond Select Member & Frank treated me as Royalty🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻❤️.  Jimmy was very helpful to my husband🙏🏻🙏🏻.  THANK YOU all from the bottom of our hearts❤️❤️👍🏻!!

Summary: I didn't like that we were asked to leave by police escort for Unnecessary reasons Best Western has fully disappointed me because I was a paying customer for more than just one day I was a paying customer for I believe a week and a half therefore I should a little bit more but unfortunately this Best Western is and being run by a certain individuals who like to pass judgment on people and unfortunate for them I will never give them any more of my business
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent visit at our hotel and please accept our sincerest apologies for the disturbance you have experienced during your stay. Summary: The only reason for falling behind in cleaning or service is because of the pandemic for which Best Western cannot be blamed. Despite this, the Best Western staff exceeded our expectations. Great stay

Sheets seemed to be clean, bu they are old and the blanket in between looked like it had seen better days about 20 years ago. Everything is just dated. The room space was fine. Not much lighting in the parking area. We just slept there and left in the morning. It was not work the amount we paid.
Manager Response: Thank you for your candid review. We apologize that your recent stay did not meet expectations. We appreciate your comments and will share these with our team so that we can continue to improve our services. We do hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back in the future, so that we can provide a better experience.  Sincerely,  Frank A.

Summary: The reservation was all messed up but frank the manager stood up and did what managers do took charge and made my stay extremely comfortable and for that I send this review would I stay there again yes  this is one of my fave riots spots and I will return to this place again
Manager Response: We appreciate the positive comments and well pleased that your stay was satisfactory. We hope you will visit us again at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites Orange Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites Anaheim-Orange Jimmy is amazing
Summary: I want to thank Jimmy for making my stay amazing he was so nice and so helpful with my stay any time i needed help with anything he took care of from clean towels to trash being thrown out along with anything else
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review for our property and for the wonderful comment about Jimmy. We hope to see you again at the Best Western Plus Anaheim-Orange.

Summary: Great customer service! Great rooms! Great prices! This is my go to place when in town for business! I would highly recommend this place! You can’t go wrong staying here!  Frank!  He was very helpful! And friendly!
Manager Response: Thank you for the 5 star review. We appreciate the comments and we hope to see you again at The Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites in Orange.

Summary Heading: My favorite place to stay!  Awesome Manager & staff!
Summary: Favorite place to stay! They have clean rooms, friendly & helpful staff, great location, close to shopping center & restaurants. The Manager, Frank, is amazing! He is the  true meaning of excellent hospitality. I highly recommend the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites in Orange, Ca. Thank you Frank for making me feel comfortable and safe during my stay at the your hotel. You're and Amazing Manager and deserve praise for the work that you do, and the relationships you build with your guests. I look forward to my next stay at the Best Western.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the wonderful review for your recent visit to Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites Anaheim-Orange. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed the service received by hotel our team members. Thank you for your recommendation and thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to see you back again in the future.

Summary: I was checked in by Frank the manager and the service was part excelance. Will be back again. Also the rooms were beautiful and clean and hotel areas were disinfected. I am impressed. This hotel deserves a ten star review or higher, I am well pleased with the stay.

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at the best plus meridian inn & suites and Frank was a big help and very courteous during our stay. I really appreciate being taking care of during our family visit to orange,Ca.
Manager Response: We are pleased to hear you had a good stay and found our service to be accommodating. Thank you for choosing to stay at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites Anaheim-Orange. We hope to see you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Walls are thin and rooms are not 3 star worthy. This hotel is like a 2-star.
Summary: AAA rated this hotel 3 stars. It is not. It is a 2 star hotel. Good value for those on s budget, though. The breakfast was good. The pool and courtyard area was very nice. Location was good.  Walls are very thin and the water pipes are very loud.
Manager Response: Dear guest, Thank you very much for your review. We are looking forward to welcoming you soon again to our Hotel

Summary: We booked this hotel for a recent stay (Feb. 26th to Feb.29th) and really enjoyed our room. We booked a king suite was very nice! Breakfast buffet was basic but it's good enough, with good quality coffee. I would specially recommend this place for a family stay, it feels safe and causy and the location can't be better, close to Anaheim and walking distance to one of California's best factory outlets whee there were some interesting brands and nice restaurants.

Summary: Very nice room.  Full seating area with TV, chair, pull-out couch, small dining table, full sink, refrigerator, microwave,  coffee maker.   Separate bedroom with closeable double doors.     As free breakfasts go this was on the nicer side.    Very nice room for a reasonable room rate.  Very impressed with Best Western.

Summary: this was a very spacious room, it is very close to disneyland less than 15 minutes by shuttle for transportation, which stops right at the hotel. This is a great value for the money. It is centrally located in the city close to amenities.

Summary: We received a suite! The room with 1 King and sofabed. Super spacious, perfect for kids. They LOVED it having their own space and we loved having our own room with double doors. Plenty of chairs, table, fridge, microwave, everything AND the kitchen sink! Awesome vanity and closet, huge mirrors. We will be staying here for every future trip to California. I'm so happy we found this. I read the reviews of many places as I'm sensitive to hard beds and we wanted not to have to worry about breakfast. The softest bed in a hotel I've experienced in a decade. Whoever the man was who makes waffles on Sunday morning deserves a raise! He was so happy and uplifting! Helpful, and awesome customer service. I read before that "the maids weren't pleasant". They do their job well and are nice

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff, Nice pool and patio, Rooms clean, In process of updating other areas
Summary: We stayed in the King Size Suite with pull-out bed/sofa. It's nice to have the King bed in a separate room with doors that separate it from the kitchen & living area (with sink, refrigerator, microwave). The bathroom and rooms were clean, but other areas of the hotel appeared to need some updating and sweeping (eg. elevator, hallways, etc). The breakfast bar had a "make your own waffle machine" and the staff person, Gaby, was so very friendly and helpful in making the waffles and keeping the breakfast area clean and running efficiently. There is an outdoor patio with fountain which is nice for dining in the morning and watching kids swim at night. It appears the hotel is under new management and attempting (little by little) to update/remodel the entire hotel. However, it was a

Summary: we arrived early & they got us a room as ours wasn't ready, they were very accommodating letting us stay a little later than normal check out, the spa & pool  were  wonderful in the center area with trees, shrubbery, flowers  & water-fountain. Being in the center made it very comfortable & safe to be in. parking, check in & out were easy. breakfast had a nice assortment of hot & cold items 7 they made the waffles for you.

Summary: Recently stayed at the BW plus Meridian. Great location for Disney. Hotel use to be a office building but it's been converted some  time ago. Dated but clean. No surprises. Breakfast Is usual free food. Also close to lots of choices for dining and shopping.   Use the ART bus it's 3 days of unlimited rides for $5.00 a person if your 55 or older. Picks up right at lobby and drops you at front door of Disney! Also has lots of other stops and routes.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Dear guest, Thank you very much for your review. We are looking forward to welcoming you soon again to our Hotel  George Front Desk Manager

Summary: The staff is courteous and attentive.  The facility is very nice.  Breakfast was good.  The WiFi is good.  This is in a great area, central to all that interests us.  We will return here when traveling in the area again.

Summary Heading: Good if not walking to Disneyland
Summary: Not close enough to walk to Disneyland. But if you are already planning to use the ART Shuttle or park your car. The Toy Story lot is not far. Currently the value is good. I have not tried their wifi yet. Breakfast and Parking are included. Good beds. Though I always bring my own pillows, they have 2 types of pillows that might fit your preference.  -Parking is pretty tight on space. -Breakfast, Parking, Wifi included. -good size mini fridge -large kitchen area countertop space. -Exterior facing doors are actually in a closed in hallway with Windows to the outside or facing the courtyard pool area. -good amount of indoor and outdoor breakfast tables. -good hot breakfast -TV viewing locations in the rooms are odd, but we didn't really watch much TV. -The beds are comfortable.

The breakfast they provide is also a great bonus, though it's pretty average in terms of quality. We weren't on top of each other. The bedroom has separating doors so that the kids could get to bed early and my husband and I could lounge in the living room area without disturbing them.  Breakfast was included and we thought it was a great perk.  Not just continental.  The distance was a little further to Disneyland than we thought but we Uber'ed into downtown Disney with no problem. We usually stay at Disney hotels, and for a family of 4, hard to find places for 4 suitcases. We had no problems in this set up! We stayed here for three days to visit Disneyland, and I would definitely return. We used Lyft for traveling which was easier than using the shuttles. This hotel was very clean, beds were cozy, the pool and hot tub were awesome. Same continental style breakfast as anywhere else, except the breakfast here tasted better. Even the coffee was the first drinkable hotel coffee I've had.  The set up is more motel-like, in that people do have to walk by your windows, but it is in an enclosed courtyard. We stayed on the third floor above the pool and had no issues with noisy families or people walking by our window. Excellent price and excellent deal; we were very happy to stay

Good strong shower. Pool. Our stay was perfect. Thank you to the friendly breakfast and front desk staff and the nice lady that cleaned our room.

Summary Heading: Room was ok, but the rest of the hotel is tired and grungy
Summary: The room was actually ok and had a lot of room and a kitchenette. The outside though feels a bit like a prison. Brownish ugly walls, gray inside/outside carpeting that is clearly old and worn. The rooms are built in two rings around a courtyard (with a pool). One of these hotels where windows open up directly onto the corridor so the only way to get light into the room is to let everyone going by see into your room. It was also really noisy. There was a group of kids in the pool until late in the evening and even though our room wasn't on the inside facing directly onto the pool, it was really noisy. Cannot imagine what it would have been like in an inside room.  Breakfast was mediocre at best. Your standard continental along with plasticky scrambled eggs and dubious sausage.

Very nice hotel - clean, large room - beautiful courtyard/pool area.  We liked that this hotel was a little off the "disney" beaten path.  In an area that was a little more quiet, but yet a big mall was very close.  Breakfast was great - they actually had an attendant who was preparing the waffles at the machine.

Our room's refrigerator wasn't working, we called the front desk and had someone come check out the refrigerator with in 10 mins and they replaced it within 20 mins from the call to the front desk!!   No hassles, or waiting around, they got the job done very quickly!!   We have stayed here many times and will continue to stay here!   Hands down one of the best hotels in the area.

Included is free wifi, parking and a good wholesome breakfast with an excellent service from a gentleman who was running the buffet like clockwork while ensuring everybody had what they needed. The rooms were well equipped with fridge, room safe, coffee maker, etc, although it would have been nice to have a microwave as well. Although close to large avenues and a highway, the room was quiet. However walls seem a bit thin and you can hear the neighbours, especially when using the shower. Summary: I actually got this hotel through a "name your own price" deal on priceline.    Initially, I was a little disappointed when I got it as I was staying with my family and hoped for a location a little closer to Disneyland.   However, I knew the rules going in and was willing to take the gamble.    When I got there, priceline had booked the room for 2 people (instead of the 4 we were traveling with)  one of the issues I have with priceline is they don't let you change the amount of people traveling with when naming your own price. It is stuck at 2, this is not the hotels fault, but it is still kind of stupid, but it is another risk you take when naming your own price.    So when I got there I asked to be upgraded from a single King bed to 2 queen beds.  They obliged.  It cost me an

Summary: My family and I were very pleased with this hotel.  We stayed in a suite with a queen size bed and sofa bed with a kitchenette.  Breakfast was included with the price so we saved a lot of money.  We were 4 in our party and there was still plenty of room to move around.  The location is excellent, next door to the Outlets at Orange.  Definitely coming back!

Hotel was close to Disneyland. Only took about 10 minutes to get there. The beds are comfortable. Rooms were clean. Great breakfast included. Close to restaurants and shopping. Great value! Will definitely stay here again!!

Summary Heading: This will be our go to hotel in Anaheim!
Summary: I have stayed here twice and rather enjoyed my stay both times. The rooms are a decent size, the beds are comfy and the bathrooms are clean! The free breakfast is hot! You actually get waffles, eggs and sausage on top of your regular breakfast cold foods. The shuttle is so very convenient. It's a reasonable price too. It picks you up straight at the door and drops you off at the entrance of Disneyland. The parking is also free so if you have a rented car, this is perfect. I've noticed the prices have gone up a little since the last two times I booked, however I think it's worth it!

Summary Heading: Beautiful, modern room with a bargain price tag
Summary: The room is very clean and modern.  The bed has both hard and soft pillows.  That was very thoughtful.  I also like the location of this hotel.  It is only 10 minutes driving to little Saigon and about 35 minutes to Los Angles convention centers (without traffic) or close to 1 hour with traffic .  We definitely will come back again.  For less 100 bucks a night, It is a steal!

I had a suite with 2 queen site. Room had a lot of spacing. It had microwave, fridge.... dining table, sofa ... TV had enough channels to watch. Didn't use internet so I have no input. Big breakfast room and had different selections. A lot of parking space. Couple minutes drive to the outlet mall and that is my wife and kid spent time when I am at the conference.

Summary Heading: Very nice suites, property, pool, and people.
Summary: Leah was the consummate professional and genuinely warm and welcoming at check in and throughout the stay. Beautifully appointed suites with excellent bed and bedding, workstation desk, sofa, mini fridge, flat screen with full channels. Very clean. The lush patio and pool, hot tub area are well maintained. Plenty of breakfast choices: cheesy scrambled eggs, sausage, waffles, cereals, oat meal, yogurt, fruit, 🍌, juice, coffee etc.  All staff are friendly and accommodating. Well done.

The Hotel was CLEAN, efficient and friendly! GREAT STAFF!  The FULL breakfast is INCLUDED in your room price: FRESH eggs, sausage, make-your-own waffles, decent coffee, orange and apple juices, hot crock of oatmeal with 6 toppings, muffins, rolls, four cold cereals and cold milk. Fruit and yogurt as well.  My room had 2 40" tv's alarm clock, efficiency kitchen with microwave and doors that seperate the bedroom from the main room/kitchen. That was a nice touch.  BE AWARE that there is relatively NOTHING within a 1/2 mile except the strip mall mentioned above, so STOCK UP if you have a rental car.  I would DEF recommend and would stay there again!

Summary Heading: Nice and quiet, but the key card is difficult to use
Summary: My room had a nice kitchenette, and was very quiet from the street noise, and had a separate bedroom. Nice and large and a good value for the money. But… It was very difficult to get the key card to work as I had to put it in only halfway and take it out very quickly. It was very picky and frustrating. The hotel was nice and close to the Hyatt Regency convention center and the Anaheim convention center. About 10 minute drive away from the convention center.

Erica answers phone. Rude talks over you. Talks around your question. When asked to speak to mgr..she claims she is the general manager and she doesn't report to anyone. Wrong field to be working in!! Your facility is represented by her lack of customer service skills!!  ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!!    BEWARE!!  THIS FACILITY ALSO CHARGES EXTRA 'TAX' FEES--$11 PER NIGHT PER ROOM.

Room was large and very clean. Most of time was at Disneyland. Hotel was a short drive from Parks and was very relaxing to come back to. All hotel staff I came in contact with was very friendly and professional.

I stayed here for two nights and overall it was a good experience.  The place is nothing fancy but the customer service was excellent.  The room was large and the bed was very comfortable.  There was a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker.  I had a 3rd floor room and it was facing the court yard.  It was pretty quiet even though I was next to the elevator.  The free wifi and parking is a nice touch.  The breakfast was nothing fancy with the basics.  There is a gym and this is my only complaint. The equipment needs to be cleaned and maintained.  Overall for the price it was a good value.  I would stay again.

Summary Heading: Resort fee charged at checked in
Summary: The hotel should provide the information upfront about the resort fee of USD11 per night in their website and also to their third party reseller. We were not aware of this charge at the point of online booking.  The hotel was comfortable, the location is 5 minutes drive to the outlet at Orange and the breakfast provided is plenty. We were quite happy with the hotel except for the resort fee.

Found dirty socks upon opening door to room, found penny in bed. No lotion in room or available at front desk. Decided to reduced my 3 nights to 1.  No apology or mention of any of the above at checkout

My daughter and I stayed here for one night. We really appreciated the complimentary breakfast.  We were able to get to Disneyland within 20 minutes and started our day early.  Very likely to stay here again.

Came here with my family for a two day getaway to enjoy so-cal. Wanted something that would be centrally located and accessible to freeways. Found this little gem which was clean and very decent price. Front staff was friendly and courteous. Enjoyed my stay here. Will most likely stay again

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay for peace and quiet
Summary: Although the guest upstairs from us had a child constantly running in the room all hours of the day and night, we've always had a great stay here.  The management is rude but the rest of the staff is great.

Check-in was easy. I called a day before to ask about arriving late and was informed no charge as long as arriving anytime after 3pm to 8pm. Reasons for my stay here was mainly because of past and previous reviews about the breakfast and parking. This is a plus for me! However, I must warn you upon checking in you are required to sign a imprinted credit card slip with zero dollar amount. The receptionist also make a copy of your driver's license. I wasn't paying much attention if they made a copy of my credit card, but I was told that there is $100 fee for security deposit. I thought it was strange that I gave them my debit card and the receptionist said only my hotel charge went through but not my security deposit?? when i checked my account, the original credit card that I use

We were promptly greeted and efficiently taken care of. The room was small but clean - all we really needed. Nice quiet sleep and excellent breakfast included with our stay. The staff servicing the breakfast area was very friendly and helpful. Wifi included.

Summary Heading: Never again! Pinesol solution for ants?!?!
Summary: This is our 3rd time this year coming here and never had a problem till now. Horrible, rude customer service and we just checked in today. 1) Fridge did not work, no solution to the issue till tomorrow other then take a few of our things to be held in their office fridge  2) Mystery sock found from previous  guest 3) Ants in the room coming through tub grouting, or lack there of I should say.   Here's the best of it all, send someone to spray for ants with pinesol, yes folks, I said pinesol!  Then tell your guests, no rooms to switch to till tomorrow and you cant check out either without paying full stay of 4 nights! So it gets even better, when the ants return, rude front desk agent says they have no other solution but to talk to the manager tomorrow. We ask for bug spray at

This hotel exceeded my expectations. The hotel is clean quiet and very comfortable.  The staff was very helpful and kind. I took the shuttle  to Disneyland and back to the hotel , this is a great service. It was on time and very convenient. I will definitely stay at this hotel  again.

Great location, clean, good breakfast, free parking.  This is our second time using Best Western for our Disneyland, Beach Vacation.  Close to airport and other fun destinations.  Spacious rooms, comfy beds, the kids loved the outdoor pool and décor.

It was a very nice surprise to walk into the beautiful totally remodeled lobby & breakfast area. They opened up a wall between them to give a much nicer appearance. It also gave more seating room to both. The addition of 3 new computers & a printer by the front deck was a nice touch. The ceiling to floor window in the breakfast area looking out to the center courtyard & pool area was beautiful.

Loved our stay at this hotel because the King suite was very large & clean. the staff so friendly, buffet breakfast tasty and the location was very good (near mall with many shops and eateries), all within our budget.  The pool and spa looked inviting but we didn't have a chance to use it.

Our room was comfortable, with a great comfortable king bed and queen sized fold out couch for the kids.  The hotel was near the Outlet Mall.  We were able to take the shuttle bus for $5 adult $3 child roundtrip to Disney and avoid traffic and parking fees.  We really enjoyed the hot breakfast in the morning.  They had eggs, sausage, waffles, oatmeal. pastries, muffins, toast, cold cereal, juice and coffee. The hotel was clean and the service was kind and courteous!  I highly recommend this hotel!

We stayed one night at this Best Western. Front desk staff was friendly and check in and out was fast. Breakfast was good, standard Best Western breakfast. The breakfast attendant was very friendly and helpful. The room had several little things that needed repaired and for some reason the TV volume would go extremely high on commercials, but besides that we had a good stay and felt it was a good value for what we got.

Summary Heading: LOCATED AROUND ALL THE MAJOR FREEWAYS IN ORANGE COUNTY
Summary: I had the pleasure of staying here after searching many different Hotels in the Area.  Very reasonable rate and the room was a pleasant surprise.  The interior was very modern and the staff was very helpful.  I was in a Suite and this allowed me lots of space to work at a real table and an area that was set apart from the sleeping area.  I started out with a one night stay, but I had to stay another night as I could not finish all of my work in the area.  The Staff was very helpful and it was one other thing I did not have to worry about.  Nice places to eat near by and again, Very easy access to all the freeways for travel in every direction.  If you are going to an event at the "Big A' or the Honda Center, This is a must stay......

This place is INCREDIBLE and clean! Very very clean! Almost too clean, the ONLY negative thing I came across was that the chemicals they used to clean the toilet was a little harsh on the tushy! I wiped it down with a wet washcloth and was good to go after that. I rather a very clean place than a dirty one! It was honestly a little scary driving up, the place was dark and looked nothing like a hotel. I walked in and was completely blown away by the decor. It was awesome and modern. The changing lights on the wall were a nice touch along with the glass elevators! The staff was friendly and hospitable from the second I walked in. I even got to check in two hours early. I wish I could take the bed home with me, it was the most comfortable sleep I've had in a long time! Breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for completing the survey regarding your recent stay at our property.   Your business is very important to us and we value your feedback. By telling us what you liked about your stay and how we can improve, you are helping us deliver a superior experience

Summary: We have found when we stay at this Best Western it has always been a good experience. Excellent staff, friendly, well groomed, polite and helpful. The gentleman at breakfast is always smiling and helpful. A good way to start your day. We would recommend this hotel to anyone we know who is looking for a good place to stay in this area.  Thank you for always providing a good experience.

Satisfactory overall with staff, hotel and room. It was just for the night but it was in a good location to the family we were visiting and it was within the price range of other similar hotels. We have stayed here in the past and will continue to stay when in the area.

I rated this Hotel very good, however, when we first entered our room, the smell was horrible.  It was, I think, a cleaning solution.  The carpets looked dirty and we thought about leaving.  However, after leaving the air conditioner on and purchasing room deodorizing spray, the smell eventually didn't bother us.  The furniture was pretty warn and the living area sparse, but the beds were fantastic and the shower was heavenly.  We were impressed with the dispensers for cream and soap and in the breakfast area, dispensers for plastic ware was impressive - keeping everyone from fingering it.  The food average but with good weather, you could sit outside and listen to music.  Also, there is no fee for parking which is nice!  This hotel tries hard to accommodate.

Summary Heading: Great Place to rest and relax
Summary: This is an excellent hotel to use for family and friends who might be visiting Disneyland.  It is on the route for the bus to the park and is within walking district of a large mall.  The suite aspect allows for a variety of friends to stay together.  It is clean and comfortable.  It is in the process of being upgraded and has a great staff who are willing to help in anyway possible.

Great beds, great service especially for breakfast with Nagy! Decent rooms which need updating but good service from all staff. Pool and hot tub are very nice but lack of lounge chairs are a problem. Need new chairs!

The walls and floor and bathrooms finish product were below average for cleanliness.  Bathroom was just a room you see in third word countries.  If you want to keep it that way at least leave some kind of shoes is the rooms.

The room was big and room for a family of 4. The staff was very helpful and knowledgeable. Loved the 2 TV's, the kids had one and use adults had the other. This place was picked because it is a great location to a lot of things in the area.

The front desk staff was very rude both on telephone and in person.  And while the suite was adequate, it was disgusting to see shampoo and other goo running down the sides of the tub/shower.  Would never stay at this property again.  I realize that each Best Western property is individually owned and managed, but the management at this property seems very lacking

We were mostly satisfied with our stay.  Stayed there 5 nights.  Location is central for most of Orange County.  We had a suite.  Good size.  Aged furniture and smelled of smoke.  Family had another room that smelled OK.  TV was hard to use without many channels.  Breakfast was good.  Nice to have outside space to eat.  I would stay again but make sure our room didn't smell.  Fancy way of using air conditioning was useless.  Was supposed to turn off when we took the key but stayed on anyway.  Therefore, we used more electricity than we otherwise would have.  So much for being "green".

Stayed at this location because of the lower rate.  Could of used  more lighting at bedside.  TV Directory needs updating and premium cable was unavailable.  Daily breakfast items were the same everyday: eggs, sausage, waffles, oatmeal, yogurt, cereal, apples & bananas, except danish and/or muffins for pastries and usual beverages.  No microwave because of standard king room.  No Guest Services booklet in room, only on phone handle.  Liked the shampoo/conditioner/shower gel dispensers in bath and hand wash/lotion dispensers at sink.  Will most likely stay at the Santa Ana location off Hwy 55 in the future (better breakfast items).

Was pleasantly surprise with room! Very clean with separate living room, 2 tvs, microwave, fridge, large counter space, small dining table, couch and chair. Bed was comfortable and plenty of pillows. Staff was friendly and Disneyland shuttle for $5 round trip was very convenient. Lots of restaurants close by. And a $6 uber ride to the outlet mall. Safe area. Would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear CarrieArr,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay. Its great to hear you really liked the room sizes offered at our property. Over 90% of our rooms on property consist of suites, allowing our guests a more spacious and convenient stay than found at an average hotel room.  And we agree that the location is great! Many of our guest have stayed with us over the years because of our centralized location, offering convenient commutes to Disneyland as well as local attractions like Angels Stadium, the Outlets at Orange, and much more. Its wonderful to hear that you found it convenient as well!  We hope you come visit again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The hotel was up to date, nice decor. It was close to the highway and lots of parking available. We stayed in a King suite and it was perfect. The housekeeping kept everything perfect. Nice choice complimentary breakfast in the mornings. The beds were comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to anyone! We were very impressed and would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear WanderlustSydney123,  Thank you for the excellent review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. The staff takes great pride in providing our guests a perfect stay, and its wonderful to hear that that is what you experienced. Our hotel is continuing to invest in further improvements, so we hope the next time you visit, you'll enjoy it even more than the first time around.  Thanks again for your wonderful review!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The hotel was clean and the rooms large but sparsely furnished. We were staying with 2, 14 year old girls in a double queen room. Assuming this was a suite, the couch did not offer a hide-a-way bed and the four of us were crammed into 2 queen beds into one of the rooms while the other room sat empty. We asked for a rollaway but they were not available. Only King suites have the couch bed.  The hotel lobby was undergoing renovation and appeared to be headed in a nice direction. Breakfast was tasty but really got old after the 3rd day. Would have been great if they had switched it up a few times per week.  Overall a good stay with no issues. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear adguy34,  Thank you for your review of our hotel! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property.  We are glad you were able to stay and relax in one of our many room suites. The majority of our property consists of suites, allowing traveling families greater flexibility to share rooms. We are sorry that we were unable to accommodate your request for a rollaway. During busy seasons, there can be times where the large number of traveling families can use up our entire supply of rollaways, and we apologize that we were unable to satisfy your request this time around. Please let us know ahead of time of your need for a rollaway bed, and we will do our best to ensure you have one.  It is also great to hear you liked our lobby transformation. Our hotel is undergoing a number of exciting improvements, and our lobby and breakfast area have recently completed those upgrades. We hope you stay with us again in the future to see the finished product!  Thanks again for your review.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Initially the pictures and review had me booking this hotel but very different when I arrived? The staff member I met at arrival couldn't help me in my assignment of room and didn't seem to care on top of the actual room problems> I stay primarily at Best Western and wont go back to this one.
Manager Response: Dear mikecQ2954CI,  Thank you for your review and I am so sorry your stay did not meet your expectations. It is not acceptable for any of our guests to feel that way and we will address your issue with the staff. Thank you for your loyalty to the Best Western brand, and we hope you will come back and give us another chance. We promise to make it better than your prior visit.  Thanks again for your review.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: If you have a chance go to Anaheim for Disneyland, I recommend you should stay at BW located at Anaheim Orange. It's nice, clean  hotel with good price and great breakfast. Check out the price comparing with another hotels. I bet you will satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear Thuy N,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites - Anaheim-Orange! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. Our staff and management team work really hard to make sure our guests get a great blend of value, spacious accommodations, breakfast, and other hotel amenities while staying in close proximity to the many location attractions they traveled to see. We hope you come visit us again sometime soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Pretty good value near Disneyland, Conference Center
Summary: This place was nice -- an easy trip with Uber. We had a good room to stay in, within walking distance of restaurants, etc. They people were super friendly. The whirlpool tub plug was broken which limited our use of it. Other than that, it was a good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Demetra A,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel! And thank you for taking the time to share how convenient it was. Numerous travelers over the years have enjoyed our centralized locations to many local attractions, including the Disneyland conference center. In addition to the Disney attractions, we are only minutes away from Angel Stadium, the Outlets at Orange, and much more! We hope the next time you come visit, you'll again make our hotel your home away from home.  Thanks again for your review and best regards,  Charles K.

Summary: I booked this hotel for an overnight stay for a business trip. The lobby is very nicely decorated, but once you enter the actual hotel, it's awful. It used to be an office building and it shows. The room was dark and depressing, the floors weren't clean (hair on the bathroom floor, in particular) and the furniture was scuffed, scraped and run down.   The free breakfast was what you would expect from a hotel of this caliber. I'm giving it two stars instead of one because the rooms are large and the linens seemed to be clean and fresh.
Manager Response: Hi AnneSoCal,  Thank you for writing your review, and we are sorry your stay did not live up to your expectations. Our hotel has been undergoing some renovations and many of the issues you noted will be updated in the near future. Our lobby and breakfast area were recently updated and we are happy to hear you found them nicely appointed. We will relay your comments regarding the room cleanliness to our staff as that is unacceptable by our standards. We hope you give us another chance to be your place of residence when in the area. Please don't hesitate to contact us if there is anything we can do to earn your business back.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My original stay was for 18Jul to 22Jul but stayed an extra night because we were having a good time, my sister stayed at a different hotel but moved to here for 2 days after seeing our room, the breakfast was pretty good compared to some other free breakfast that other hotels offered, the staff was very friendly and always had a smile as though they were happy to see us, the beds was surprisingly comfortable. I guess my only complaint if you must find something to complain about is that the bath towels were a little hard but that's expected, the hotel had plenty of exits to the parking lot and the mall was just a couple blocks away that had bowling and video games and decent restaurants so we were never bored.  See y'all soon because we will be back. Thanks Best Western  Grizzo
Manager Response: Dear Grizzoryder,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property and hope you had a wonderful vacation enjoying Disneyland. We pride ourselves on being able to provide spacious rooms, substantial breakfast, and great service at a competitive price; and we are happy to hear you agree! We are so glad you found our location to be convenient to the local attractions and hope you come back soon to enjoy the Anaheim-Orange area even more!  Best regards,  Charles K.

Summary Heading: Hidden fees, unbending, and check your pillows
Summary: I wish I could give it a zero star rating.  Three reasons...  !. It seems that if you book a room at this hotel through a third party vendor (Priceline, etc.) this hotel will add an additional "Resort Fee" to your bill.  I've done some Internet research and the amount of this Resort Fee varies.  My family arrived and was told by the front desk they would have to pay an additional $11.00 per day Resort Fee.  This added significantly to the bill.  Mind you this hotel is not really a resort quality hotel, but in further investigation I discovered that they charge the "Resort Fee" because the hotel is physically located in a resort area (Disneyland being a few miles away).  There is a swimming pool at the hotel and there is a breakfast available but that's it for anything coming
Manager Response: Dear Grayson907,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review and we are so sorry that you did not enjoy your stay. Our goal as a staff is to never allow our guests to feel how you felt you were treated as a guest as well as experience disappointment in your room cleanliness. Your comments have been relayed to our staff and we will make sure incidents like this are not repeated in the future.  Moving forward, our hotel is in the midst of continuing property updates and we hope you will give our property and staff a second chance to earn your trust back. We are excited about the upcoming changes and hope you will take the chance to experience our hotel as it continues to evolve.  Thanks again for your review.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Room was overall clean, and the price for what is included in the hotel and breakfast and location was perfect.  Room was comfortable, cleaned everyday, swimming pool, and small jacuzzi.  The pool area gets loud when we were there so rooms on the outside part of hotel might be quiter.  The only thing was the room above us you could hear noises so try and get a top floor and the king bed suite.
Manager Response: Dear JhansumRgr,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are so glad you enjoyed your 5-night stay with us. We really believe we provide terrific value for our guests due to our large room size, free breakfast, and pool amenities which are very convenient for extended family trips.   We would be happy to place you in one of the outside-facing rooms at our property the next time you come and visit. We recently completed installation of windows to enclose our originally open hallways to keep our hallways even quieter than before. We are committed to continually improving our property and have more in the works so that guests like you have stays even better than before.  Thank you again for your review and we hope to see you again in the near future!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: ONE OF THE BEST PROPERTIES EVER, Right off highway, Orange Co.
Summary: By far one of the nicest properties we've ever stayed, in fact, we extended our two night stay to five nights!  Literally right off highway, listed as Orange, CA, close to Garden Grove and Anaheim areas.  #215 was 2 room suite with seating area and kitchen, including table, chairs, mini-fridge, microwave and sink.  Living area included a large sofa, end table, coffee table, side chair, credenza with TV.  Very spacious, clean and finely appointed.  Bedroom with 2 Queen beds, spacious, clean, decorated nicely, wall mounted TV.  Adjacent bathroom featured tub and toilet separate from vanity and sink which was nice for 3 of us getting showered.  Large closet with safe inside.  Property featured a lovely outdoor pool with whirlpool set amist lovely palms tree of the courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear Gibsoninpa,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay as well as all the amenities our property has to offer. Our hotel consists primarily of suites for our guests, allowing folks to stretch out and relax while recharging for your trip. We hope you return and stay with us again! We have a number of local attractions that are minutes away. Disneyland, the Outlets at Orange, Angel Stadium, and more are located only a short drive away from our centralized location.   Thanks again for your review and best regards,  Charles K.

Summary: I read the reviews before choosing this hotel.  I was disappointed upon arrival.  The lobby looks good and the pool area, but the interior of the halls and the room are grubby and outdated.  The walls were dirty and the closet door was offtrack, broken and rusty.  The staff was nice.  Breakfast was o.k., but they needed more staff to keep up with demand.
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia H,  Thank you for your review of our hotel and thank you for staying with us while in the Anaheim-Orange area.   Its great to hear you enjoyed some of our recent improvements to the lobby and the pool area. And we hope you also like our recent breakfast room remodel, as we have made great updates to improve our guest morning experience.  We are sorry you were disappointed with some of the hall and room conditions. We are in the midst of finalizing our renovation plan for those areas, and we know that when those changes are complete, you will find our hotel to be even better than before.  Please stay with us again and we hope to see you again.  Best regards, Charles K.

Summary: Clean room. No insulation between rooms especially floors above. A/C not easy to use.In order to have air you have to insert key in receptacle by front door, then go to bedroom and try to work thermostat. Hot breakfast Close to Disneyland, and Orange Mall and to UCI hospital
Manager Response: Hello Lulu120639,  Thank you for staying with us and for your review of our hotel. We are glad you enjoyed the great breakfast our staff works hard to provide as well as our centralized location in Anaheim-Orange.   We are sorry to hear that you did not like the A/C interface. For the purposes of being energy-conscious, we have key card receptacles to ensure the units are active only when the room is occupied. And we have made sure to post instructions on the wall, so valued guests like yourself are aware of how to adjust the temperature of the rooms.  We hope you are able to visit the area again in the future, and we would love to be your home away from home when you return.  Best regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: A comfortable bed,  , a clean bathroom with plenty of towels, a separate living room to lounge around in the evening.  What else can one wish for?  May be a microwave oven...... Location is great and Best Western Plus Meridian staff is courteous and pleasant.  We very much enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Le-Thuy P,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property. And we are happy to hear that you really enjoyed your stay with us. We hope the next time you stay with us, and hopefully you will be able to stay in one of our many rooms that come equipped with microwave ovens too!   Best regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Not the best in the west, and not the worst
Summary: I tend to stay at Best Westerns, Holiday Inns, and other chains on my way cross-country, as you're always sure to get decent rooms and clean sheets.  More than that is frankly, just icing.    This place is pretty good, the breakfasts are of the standard BW variety, nothing to write home about but "included" is always nice.  It is close to all of the local attractions in the area and the Orange circle.    Of note: there is a bit of a homeless population nearby, but they are relatively unobtrusive, unless waiting for the bus at the bus stop at this locations front entrance.
Manager Response: Dear lobsterollsforever,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are glad you chose us for your stay in the Anaheim-Orange area. We are glad you found our rooms and amenities to be acceptable to your standards. Our hotel staff works hard to make sure that the vital parts of your stay (a clean room and good breakfast) can be reliably provided to our well-traveled guests.  We are sorry you found your experience at the bus stop to be unpleasant. Reports of these types of interactions are infrequent, so it is unfortunate that it occurred to you. We will be on the lookout to ensure it does not happen in the future.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: I enjoy coming to this hotel every time I come to Disneyland.  I enjoy the remodel that was done.  I do miss the staircase but over all this really helps out the view of the hotel.  I enjoy staying here as the staff in the kitchen make my stay very home style.  The location and grounds are always kept clean.
Manager Response: Dear Cesar R,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! And we are so glad you enjoyed our remodel. Our design team worked hard to update our look and create a modern and fun look for our guests. And we have further improvements in the works as well with the corridors. We really appreciate your continued loyalty, and we hope that as you stay with us further, that you will find our property continuing to grow and improve.   Looking forward to hosting you again on your next visit!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with kids
Summary: Great place to stay with kids and family. The hotel was good overall with breakfast option. It was close to Disney only 15 mins drive to Disneyland which was our main reason to stay. Will surely come back next time.
Manager Response: Dear Pranav B,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suite, Anaheim-Orange! We are happy that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. And we hope you enjoyed our newly renovated breakfast area! We put a lot of time and effort into ensuring that our guests have a great space to begin their day while enjoying their breakfast. When you come back to the area to visit Disneyland again (as I am sure the kids will likely request), please come visit us again! We would happy to make your next Disney trip a success again.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We had a great stay at this location. They had a shuttle service to Disney, we did not use this but did see this. We stayed here based on proximity to Angels stadium. The stadium is only a 5 minute drive away on City Drive. The breakfast staff are friendly and everything was presented as clean. If we ever visit the area again, this will be our first choice. Their parking is free and they have plenty of parking spaces.
Manager Response: Dear Tanya D,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange! Its great to know that you enjoyed your stay! We hope that when you come and stay with us again, you will be able to enjoy our renovated public areas too. Our breakfast and lobby renovations are complete, and now the corridors will receive an update in coming months. So the next time you come for an Angels game, the hotel will look more refreshed than before.  Please visit us again and we would be happy to be your home away from home!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The Best Western was a nice hotel that was about 4 miles (5-8 minutes) from Disneyland.  It was worth the drive not to have to pay the higher priced hotels in the area.  The rooms were OK and the hotel staff was nice.  Over all the stay was OK, I would have paid more for a nicer and closer hotel if you have the means.
Manager Response: Dear William F,  Thank you for your review of our hotel and great to hear that you were able to take advantage of our close proximity to Disneyland! On a trip where you are investing the money to maximize your Disney experience, we are glad that our hotel was able to help you get there. Our location has been one of the primary reasons many guests stay with us. The next time you come and visit, we hope you stay with us and explore the many other attractions near our hotel like Angels Stadium, the Outlets at Orange, and many more. Thanks again for your review!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: King suite has master suite with door, family room with fold out, microwave, coffee maker and sink. Free breakfast daily and nice size pool. Just minutes drive to Disneyland. Near outlets with tons of food options. Nice area and easy freeway access.
Manager Response: Dear ReviewitSandi,  Thank you writing this review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay at one of our King Suites. The majority of our property consists of suites, allowing our guests substantial space to recharge themselves while traveling. Its great to hear you found our location to be convenient to the local attractions as well! We always love to hear when our guests have had a successful stay. Please make sure to visit again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Noisy pipes. Every time someone used water the room rumbled.Floors paper thin. People walking up stairs woke you. Aircon marginal at best. Currently under renovation.  Old and run down. Double billed by website and reception. Still chasing my money. Being on vacation you don't need hassles. BW head office a pain. Cancelled all my other reservations and wont bother with Best Western. 5 week vacation with kids to USA from Oz  spoiled by these amateurs. Stick with Hilton group. They can change credit card details at front desk.Will spend my $10000 budget there. Lodged disputed transaction with bank.
Manager Response: Dear John K,  Thank you for your review and we are so sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. We can imagine that having this type of an experience while on an overseas trip can cause a lot of undesired grief. Also, being double-billed is unacceptable and we will address the issue to make sure it won't happen again. Our hotel is currently nearing completion of its renovation, with an upgraded lobby, new breakfast area, and soon to be refinished corridors. Coupled with our convenient location in the Anaheim-Orange area, our guests will have an enhanced experience while staying on our property. While your stay may not have been satisfactory, we hope that you will give our property another chance when you return back to the States.   We hope the rest of your trip was enjoyable and we hope you give us another chance to earn your trust back.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Great location for Disneyland - shuttle service to/from Disneyland- close to freeways, outlets, restaurants - staff very helpful - suite had great space - breakfast was the usual nothing great - problems with room was moldy bathroom ceiling, tub drains slow, broken bathroom towel rack, carpet needed cleaning - noticed lobby was getting a facelift so I am hoping rooms will also receive a facelift
Manager Response: Dear CaPA_visitor,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. Our centralized location has been a favorite of travelers for years. We are glad you were able to take advantage of the shuttle stop at our hotel for Disneyland. We hope it made your visit to Disneyland as efficient as possible. We are sorry to hear your bathroom condition did not meet your expectations. We aim to provide all of our guests a room in good working order, so we will pass on your comments to our maintenance staff to ensure your visit in the future (and others) are free from these inconveniences. The lobby renovation (and also the front desk and breakfast area) have completed, and we hope you return to enjoy the new and improved areas.  Hope to see you again in the future.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Decided to go to Disneyland for a couple of days and booked a room here.  What a great surprise this hotel was!  The hotel was clean and breakfast was provided (basic eggs, cereal, toast...).  Plus the staff was very friendly (especially Erika).  We arrived before check in and they were very accommodating; we were even given a room upgrade!  The only bummer is that we had to drive to Disney since the hotel isn't close enough to walk (we knew that ahead of time).  But the cost of the Hotel more than made up for having to pay for parking.  It is also nice that there were no hidden hotel or parking fees. If we ever need a hotel in Anaheim again, we will definitely stay here!
Manager Response: Dear crazyteacher1,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are glad you enjoyed the amenities we provide, especially our close location to Disney. The next time you stay with us, we hope you take advantage of our close location to other local attractions like the outlets at Orange, Angels Stadium and more.   Please come stay with us again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Orange you glad you stayed here? Yes!🍊
Summary: We picked this hotel because of the price and proximity to Disneyland. It was a good choice. Friendly and helpful staff, good breakfast, nice pool and courtyard, shuttle available to take you to Disney, spacious suites and comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Dear SWT1999,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We love hearing when our guests have a great stay. We have found our close proximity to Disneyland (among other local attractions) combined with our lower prices have made it a favorite among travelers like yourself. Combined with our new renovations, we know future stays with us will be even better. We hope you come back soon and visit us again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This hotel has a "last minute" booking on the website which I havent seen on any other BW hotel. Big rooma, clean but undergoing renovation. I recommend a room facing the street. Rooms inside facing rhe pool are loud and can hear echoes. Beds are comfy and breakfast is standard.
Manager Response: Dear Gary C,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are glad you were able to stay with us, while completing a last minute booking. Our property has completed a facelift for our lobby, front desk, and breakfast areas. We are glad you enjoyed the roomy accommodations. Our hotel consists of over 95% suites, allowing our guests plenty of space during their stay. We apologize if you found the noise level hard to be too loud. Given the large number of guests we see, it can be hard to completely eliminate noise. But the next time you stay with us, our front desk would be happy to place you in a street-facing room.   We appreciate your kind review and hope you come and stay with us again.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Great staff. Hotel was undergoing renovations, so there was a lot of noise and workers...but you could hear none if it in the rooms. Elevators were being fixed so it was confusing trying to figure out which ones to use. Breakfast and pool area are amazing. No regrets and would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Theresa G,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Its great to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We also appreciate your patience with the necessary noise that comes with renovations. Our renovations are now complete, and our future guests will enjoy upgraded areas for breakfast, the lobby, and front desk. We hope you come and stay again to enjoy our upgraded facilities. In addition, our hotel enjoys a centralized location to local attractions like Disneyland, the outlets at Orange, Anaheim Angels stadium and more. We hope you come back and further enjoy all we have to offer.  Looking forward to see you again.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Decent Spot with Easy Access to OC Attractions
Summary: I concur with Michael Z in terms of the room.  Remodeling is still ongoing, check-in was a bit of a drag.  My only criticisms of the room I had was that the carpeting felt funky, and the toilet/shower area was funky - the soap dispenser fell off the wall when I was showering.  Although there were lots of channels offered on the TV, using the guide was ridiculous.    I was on an inner hallway by the pool - it was very dark - and folks were in the pool after 10 - it was noisy.  Breakfast buffet - chaotic, and not a good flow to the room. BUT YES to free wi-fi, and yes to free parking.  These are major pluses in an over-priced market.  Also, just a short drive to Disneyland, Angel Stadium, and the Outlets of Orange.  Staff was friendly.
