Manager Response: Dear Pamela G,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the centralized location of our hotel to local attractions as well as enjoyed our staff. We take great pride in ensuring our guests have the best possible stay and are glad you enjoyed the free parking and fast wifi. It is unfortunate to hear that your room carpet and bathrooms were not to your expectations. We will flow those comments to our staff for future improvement. We hope you come stay with us in the future, and we will do everything we can to make sure your stay is even better than before.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The stay was excelllent even though they were remodeling there new breakfast area they did provide the 2nd floor for breakfast. The new breakfast area should be done now. I"m sure it looks nicer now. I would go back again to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Dwayne G,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and we appreciate your patience while we completed our renovations. We are very excited about our hotel's new look, and we know returning guests will enjoy it too. Our breakfast area and lobby now feature a more open-air feel, resulting in a more comfortable experience for our guests. We hope you return soon to enjoy our newly completed areas.  Thanks again for your review and we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This place exceeded my expectations.  I paid under $100 and received a suite!  This is the nicest best western I've ever stayed at.  The room was amazing.  A living room, sink and cabinets, couch, double doors into the bedroom, huge bed, two tv's!  The pool area was very nice and although the breakfast area was a madhouse with Disney vacationers there were decent food options and it was free.  Parking was no problem and didn't cost extra like so many other places in the area. The wifi was the fastest I've seen in a hotel!  This hotel is worth it's value and then some especially compared to the rip-off hotels two exits closer to Disney (resort fees, parking fees, breakfast fee's)  You will not be disappointed with this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Michael Z,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Our property consists of 95% suites, allowing our guests to have spacious accommodations during their stay in the area. We've also invested to make sure our guests have a wonderful breakfast experience, by upgrading our breakfast area to provide more spacious eating accommodations. And we know how important internet access is to our guests, which is why we've ensured we have fast wifi available for everyone staying with us.  We hope you come and visit us again soon! We take pride in being your home away from home.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My daughter was flown to UCI Hospital and we needed to stay . We are going back and forth because of her health issues. It was touch and go. We were staying in the waiting room at hospital but needed a break.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa C,  Thank you for your review of the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are so sorry to hear about your daughter and hope that she has successfully recovered from whatever landed her in the UCI hospital. We hope that our hotel was able to provide you the much-needed respite you were looking for.   Best of luck and hope to see you in the future under much happier circumstances.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: comfortable sleep, great breakfast, great customer and professional service. nice pool and lounging area very clean inn. I will recommend friends and family to stay at the best western meridian inn and suites in Orange, California
Manager Response: Dear Headdie Y,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We appreciate you trusting us with your stay as well as taking the time to write us a review. Our hotel has just completed some dramatic renovations, modernizing our lobby and breakfast areas for our guests. We hope you come back again sometime soon to enjoy the new facilities!  Reagrds,  Charles K.

Summary Heading: 3rd party web booker?  Read 3rd class citizen
Summary: I booked a trip there for a holiday weekend through Priceline.  They warn you, it's for 2 adults, and I was with my teenage daughter, whom I can't sleep in the same bed with.  They would only book me in a one king bed room, that's it.  No rollaway allowed in the room due to "fire codes."  I went to see it, it was so small, you couldn't change your mind in there.  I would have to walk sideways to get the bathroom.  I sometimes use a walker, so that wouldn't work.  I was told that when you book through third party websites, that's the only room you can have.  Meanwhile, they were not sold out, had plenty of king rooms with more space that could fit a rollaway, but they told me no.  I was willing to pay extra for a big room, but they told me $50 extra a night.  Really?  I spoke to
Manager Response: Dear ter1229,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are so sorry your stay did not meet your expectations. Booking through third-party sites causes many hotels (not just ours) a great deal of issues due to the limitations the front office has in accommodating our guests. However, our staff tries to help out in any way available to assist. We apologize if this was not your experience, and we will relay this on to ensure it does not happen in the future.   We value your opinion and appreciate your review. We hope you will give us a chance to earn your trust back in the future.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: I stayed at this Best Western for a pre-surgery date.   Hotel was very quiet, very clean, rooms were large, staff was great.  Close to shopping,  Anaheim Stadium, and UCI hospital.  Would differently recommend this hotel.  Oh yeah Mickey Mouse's house is also not that far away....
Manager Response: Dear Gary S. S,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are happy to hear you were able to enjoy your stay at our hotel, prior to your surgery. The roomy accommodations are great for guests looking for a chance to relax. Also, our centralized location to many of the local attractions has made it a popular choice for many guests. We hope your surgery went well and we hope to have you join us again soon.  Best regards and speedy recovery, Charles K.

Summary: Had to laugh at other hotels in the Disneyland area. They charged for parking, internet and breakfast and well over $100 a night.  This facility was about four or five minutes further south and all the extras were free with a low room rate.  Rooms were comfortable, clean and well appointed.  The location is easy access with lots of restaurants, shops and major attractions close by.
Manager Response: Dear Jim E,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We take great pride in providing a great blend of location, affordability, and amenities to our guests visiting the Disneyland area. When you visit again, we hope you take the time to visit other nearby attractions like the outlet mall, Angels Stadium, and more! We hope to see you again sometime soon.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My family had an amazing time. Everything was great. We wanted a place that was close to Universal and Disneyland. This was great. We enjoyed the spa, the pool and an exceptional breakfast. We would go here many times and now when we go place we will choose Best Western Plus for our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Rori S,  Thank you for the great review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. We are glad you enjoyed the convenient proximity to Disneyland as well as our breakfast and pool amenities. The next time you visit, you will find our property with a newly renovated lobby and breakfast area. If you enjoyed your last stay with us, we think your next stay will be even better.  Please come visit us again sometime soon!   Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We thought it was a great location and the Staff was very friendly. Comfortable beds. Lots of remodeling going on right now but they try to keep things clean while working.It was a bit noisy between 8am-5pm.
Manager Response: Dear Mindie B,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay. With a centralized location, large selection of suites, and guest-oriented staff, we strive hard to provide our guests the best experience they can have. We apologize for the temporary inconveniences that are a necessary part of our renovations. But once they are complete, we know the hotel will be even better. We are so excited to show your our hotel once they are completed. Please come stay with us again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Not impressed.  Clean but beat up furniture.  Bathroom vent fan like a diesel bus, but didn't refresh air.  They are renovating lobby, so a mess inside.  Super thin walls (and ceilings) so I heard every bump, thump and shower.  I realize it's close to Disney, which accounts for the high room rate for what you get.  I'll try a smaller place or Ayres Hoyel next time.
Manager Response: Dear Lauren B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. We are sorry to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations. And we apologize for any inconveniences our renovations caused during your stay. We are working hard to renew our public areas to provide our guests a modernized feel in our lobby, hallways, and breakfast area. The renovations are slated to be completed in the near future, so we hope you visit and give us another chance.   Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your business back.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This hotel is located close to all attractions like Disneyland & Knotts Berry Farm.  It's a very quiet area, serves continental breakfast, staff are friendly and accommodating. Also the crystal cathedral is close by.
Manager Response: Dear 971classy1234,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! It is great to hear you enjoyed your stay. Many of our guests over the years have enjoyed our centralized location, allowing easy commutes to the local theme parks (like you mentioned) as well as other attractions like the outlets and sports stadiums. Our public areas are currently undergoing renovations, and we hope you come back to enjoy our new updated look!  Thanks again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Attractive hotel with very attentive staff.  Clean, attractive room.  Bathroom a little outdated - but clean. Breakfast better than many other hotels I have stayed at. I liked the energy saving program they have instituted at this hotel.  When you leave the room, the heat/AC automatically changes to energy saving mode.  Seems like a good idea.
Manager Response: Dear Marcella M,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our staff works incredibly hard to ensure our guests, like you, have a wonderful time while staying with us. We hope you are able to come stay with us again sometime soon. With our centralized location to local attractions, soon-to-be completed public area renovations, and an upcoming Best Western brand refresh, we know you will find future stays with us to be even more enjoyable. Come visit us again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My family and I were going to Disneyland and decided to stay here. That was definitely the wrong choice. When I checked in the lady at the front desk was very rude. It seemed that she really hated her job and didn't want to be there. We asked her several questions and got some answers but it was like pulling teeth. We were staying on the third floor, and the elevator was broken. We only found out about this after we checked in, we were not informed about this at check in. We asked if we could be put on a lower floor and the front desk told me no. We also found out that on the third floor there are no trash cans what so ever, so to throw anything away at all that was large you had to walk it down all the way to the first floor. The room itself wasn't bad, it was clean when we
Manager Response: Dear Joshua E,  Thank you so much for completing a review on your stay and we deeply apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We definitely strive our hardest to provide best customer service but it seems we have not met your expectations. Our property will be conducting major public area renovations including, hallways, lobby, front desk, and breakfast rooms very soon. It will be definitely refreshed once it's done and we hope we could have a chance to provide you better service with a better product at the time.  Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your business back. Again, we apologize for your inconvenience.  Thank you, Charles K.

Summary: This is the third time we have stayed here and will be back next time we are in the area. The large suites are perfect for our family of four. The breakfast is a nice amenity. My daughter loves the pool and I enjoyed the hot tub! Everyone is very friendly and helpful here.
Manager Response: Dear dandjmom,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, The Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are happy to hear our hotel is your home-away-from-home when you are in the area. Its also great that you enjoyed the spacious rooms. Our hotel is over 95% suites, giving our guests plenty of space to be comfortable while they are away from home. The breakfast and pool are also great features for traveling families, just like yours. We appreciate having you join us regularly, and we can't wait for you to stay with us again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: If you're looking for a cheap stay close to the outlets and Disney, you found it here. If you want luxury and top shelf amenities, look elsewhere. My family and I stayed here for the runDisney Tinker bell Half Marathon Weekend and found this hotel to be overall decent. I rented two rooms, one double queen and one vip king suite with the whirlpool tub. There were some things that would make me consider staying elsewhere. I didn't see any new renovations as advertised, the hotel looked a little old and run down by the heavy tourism. Upon checking in the King suite, I found a used tissue behind the bedside table so I don't think housekeeping goes over the top in cleanliness, this was proved true when the next day the soap residue from my bath wasn't cleaned. The hotel pictures are
Manager Response: Dear Janet M,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We are glad you were able to stay with us. We strive hard to provide our guests with a stay that is both affordable and comfortable. We are sorry to hear that some aspects of our hotel did not meet your expectations. WE will pass along your comments regarding room cleanliness and showerhead to our housekeeping and maintenance staff. It is great to hear that you appreciated the staff person working for breakfast. He will be happy to hear his efforts helped make your breakfast more enjoyable.   The aforementioned renovations are ongoing right now. And when they are finished, we know you will find our hotel with a modernized look and feel that our guests will enjoy.  We hope you come back and give us another opportunity to become your go-to hotel for Disney visits.  Thanks again. Regards, Charles K.

Summary: I have stayed here twice while visiting my daughter at Chapman University. The rooms are very clean, spacious with comfortable beds. The breakfast is great! Something for everyone. There are a lot of families who stay here visiting Disneyland, so you can hear kids running and yelling-not a big deal.
Manager Response: Dear suzmac1,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Its great to hear you enjoyed our roomy accommodations. Our hotel is composed of primarily suites, providing plenty of space for travelers to experience a home-away-from-home. We are happy to hear you enjoyed the breakfast! The next time you return, you may find the breakfast area to be new and improved, as it is completing some exciting renovations. In addition, we hope that you get a chance to explore many of the local attractions (the outlets, Angels Stadium, Disneyland, and more) that are within a 10 minute drive of our property.  Thanks again for your review. We hope you stay with us again soon. Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Clean and safe are my two biggest concerns and that's what we got.  We stayed here 4/24 - 4/27 for a trip to Disneyland which was a 10 minute car ride away.  Parking was free and plentiful.  The grounds were neat and clean.  We arrived at 1:00 AM and were greeted warmly.  The room was spacious and clean.  The tub and toilet were in a very small room that opened up to the spacious sink area.  Didn't love that but being it was a suite we were able to close the double doors to the other bedroom for privacy.  There was a safe and fridge/kitchen area.  The free WiFi worked great!  The beds were very comfortable but the pillows weren't.  They were way too firm.  We didn't ask for replacements so I don't know if other styles were available.  There are shampoo, conditioner and body wash
Manager Response: Dear CaribbeanDreamer1,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! It's great to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our centralized location, spacious suites, and amenities are features that our guests have enjoyed for a long time. We are sorry to hear you did not like the pillow selection in your room and also found your conditioner dispenser empty. Your comments will be passed along to our housekeeping staff.   We hope you come and visit our property again sometime soon. Our property will be completing renovations in the near future to many of our public areas. In particular, our breakfast area will be revamped allowing guests, like yourself, a refreshed area to jump-start their day before heading out to many of the local attractions (like Disneyland, the outlets, Angels Stadium, and more).  Looking forward to seeing you again. Regards, Charles K.

Summary: one morning several guest all had cold showers and another night a few people were making noise in the pool after hours. It would be nice if they put a ramp at the back entrance to help in navigating luggage and carts. The bed was comfortable. There were several ice machines and a good machine for filtered water near the front lobby.
Manager Response: Dear retired056, Thank you for sharing your review of stay. Your comment will be shared with management and reviewed for further actions. We apologize for inconvenience of hot water. It was a couple of hours that the boiler was malfunctioning and we got it fixed. I hope you had a great time in Orange / Anaheim and had a chance to visit Orange outlet mall next to us. Please do not hesitate to contact us for any help we could provide for your next stay. We will do our best to provide quality service for all guests. Thank you,  Regards,

Summary: Stayed at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites on 4-29 to 5-2, 2016, trip to Disneyland with family. Shopping and many dining options nearby. Hotel grounds are very clean and nicely landscaped. Pool area clean.Personnel at reception and in the breakfast room were polite and professional, greeted us with smile. Breakfast was a plus, it was a full breakfast as opposed to it being just donuts/pastries and coffee, good for us as my husband and I are diabetics. Kudos to the breakfast room personnel, super nice !!! Room was big, very, very comfortable beds with plenty of pillows, some soft, others firm, good lighting in room. Nice sized closet. Spacious big living room with a sofa, chair and another TV. Plus-besides the kitchen having a refrigerator, there was a full sink and
Manager Response: Dear Rafael S, Thank you for staying at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites Orange / Anaheim! We really appreciate your wonderful review. Your review will be shared with all team members at the hotel and it will encourage everyone to provide the best service. We are glad that you had enjoyed your hotel stay for Disneyland trip. We are only about ten minutes away from Disneyland with shuttle! Currently we are planning some major renovation so please make sure to revisit us to check out refreshed look! As you mentioned, most of our rooms are actual one-bed room suites with almost 500 sq/ft which is very suitable for family. Again, thank you very much for sharing your review of your hotel stay and hope to see you next time again!  Regards,

Summary: nice pool & spa in a center court well designed & decorated courtyard with comfortable seating. rooms well taken care of comfortable bed, free internet, flat screen tv. free breakfast helpful staff, even make the waffles for you.
Manager Response: Dear CaptseaweedLhc_Az,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We appreciate you taking the time to write a review of our property.  Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay and found the public areas comfortable. In the near future, we will be completing renovations to our public areas to further improve our guests' stay. An improved lobby, expanded breakfast area, and improved front desk will all serve to make our guests feel even more welcome than before.   Its also great to hear you enjoyed our rooms and breakfast. 95% of our hotel rooms are suites, providing plenty of space for our guests. And our waffles for breakfast have become somewhat of a favorite among some of our guests. We hope you come and stay with us again to enjoy our continually improving amenities!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here as a Hotwire hotel and whilst it was a long way from Disneyland, it was still excellent accommodation. The hotel has a lovely lobby, free parking and friendly staff. The rooms are a good size and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast was basic but as it was free, you couldn't really complain. The hotel is really close to the Outlets which we loved! The ART bus picked us up for a quick ride into Disneyland. If you are looking for a hotel away from hustle and bustle of Disneyland, this is a great option. The only minor complaints are that the pool is in the centre and right out the front of the room and despite it being winter, we had people swimming outside and smoking just outside our room, which wasn't very pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear mcfamily0f4,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. Our guests have always enjoyed the centralized location of our property, and we are happy you and your daughter found it convenient as well. A weekend enjoying Disneyland and the outlets sounds like a great time! We are sorry that you found the proximity of the pool to your room to be bothersome. The next time you visit, please don't hesitate to to contact our front desk staff with your concerns. They will work hard to make sure your stay is as comfortable as possible!  Hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: I was forced to take cold shower because I did not have time to wait for them to fix it. All they would say is "All we can do is apologize" and said they'd make a note and give me 10% next time. There's not going to BE a next time, so now what?
Manager Response: Dear SFSBABY,  Thank you for sharing your review of your stay. We are sincerely sorry that you had such a bad experience at our property. Unexpected issues are possible at any hotel, and our maintenance staff reacted quickly to resolve the issue as soon as it was discovered. Unfortunately, something like this cannot be solved instantaneously and we are sorry to hear you had to take a cold shower as a result. Please do not hesitate to contact our hotel directly for anything we can do to earn your business back.   Again, we apologize for your inconvenience and we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: I was looking for a little cheaper stay on this visit to Disneyland. I found this hotel in Orange and wasn't sure how convenient it would be to the park. It is only a few exits up from where I usually stay and I was pleasantly surprised. Easy on and off from the freeway, and a very nice hotel with very friendly staff. Wonderful hot breakfast with freshly made waffles. I would highly recommend this as an option to the higher priced hotels near Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear dham18,  Thank you for the great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Many of our guests over the years have happily stayed at our hotel while visiting Disneyland, and we are happy to find that your stay was also an enjoyable one. And you are right about the short commute to the theme park. It is very close by! Also, there is a shuttle that stops by our property enroute to the theme park if you were interested in skipping the drive altogether.   We are glad you enjoyed our breakfast as well, especially the waffles! You will be excited to know that our breakfast area is currently undergoing renovations to further improve our guests' morning meal. Later this year, upon completion, our guests will find a new and improved area to enjoy their breakfast and jump-start their day. We hope you stay with us again and enjoy the new amenities coming for future guests.  Thanks again for your kind review. We hope to see you again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The place was very clean and the staff were great, good choice I will stay here again at my next visit....plenty of parking and secure, I'm glad I picked this place, the freeway is just one block away so it made it fast and easy to get back on the road again.
Manager Response: Dear Elvis C,  Thank you for your kind review of the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. We are incredibly proud to provide our guests a place where they can rest safe and comfortably. We do hope you come back to stay with us again. The next time you come, we hope you enjoy many of the local attractions like Disneyland, the outlets, and Angels Stadium. They are all within a short 10 minute drive of our property.   Thanks again for your wonderful review, and we hope to see you again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We stayed here a couple of days ago. Our room was clean and comfortable and the courtyard was so appreciated after our long day. Lovely fountain and pool. But what I want to mostly relay is the staff who went above and beyond for us from helping with charging our phone ( left our charger at home) to the assistance to help with the AC. And a high five to the man I think " Nevy" for helping me grab a quick breakfast on the way out. Well done and I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Albert D,  Thank you for the outstanding review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Our staff works their hardest to make sure our guests have the most comfortable stay they can. We are so happy you enjoyed your stay and hope that you return again. We hope to continue to be your home-away-from-home the next time you return.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Not a good place to stay
Summary: Not a good place to stay, found a roach and the AC was not working. I called them twice and their so called "energy saver" AC did not work. I was not impressed at all. I do not recommend staying at this specific location. I'm not sure how the others work.
Manager Response: Dear Nohemi T,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. We are so sorry to hear about the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. We have let our housekeeping and maintenance know about the roach and the A/C and will work hard to ensure these deficiencies do not occur in the future. We strive hard to ensure our guests have a restful stay free from worries, and we hope you give us another chance to win your trust back. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly and let us know how we can earn your business again.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here when we went to Disney.  It was a great choice.  The breakfast was pretty good (eggs, waffles, etc); it was plenty to fill your stomach.  Also, for only $5 per day/person, you could ride the ART to/from Disney, which was very convenient.  The bed was pretty comfortable, so I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Emily T,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange! We are pleased to hear you were able to take advantage of the conveniences our hotel provides to our guests traveling to visit Disneyland. Our breakfast area (which will be receiving design upgrades in the near future) provides our guests a quick jump-start to their days. And the shuttle availability makes commutes to Disney as pain-free as possible. We hope the next time you visit us, you also have the chance to visit other nearby location attractions like the outlet mall and Angels Stadium. They are only a short 10 minute drive away! We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This is a good place to stay, value per dollar is great, I had a 2 room suite and good internet connection was fast enough to actually do some work with the computer.  The staff was very friendly and helpful at check-in and it looked like they had a nice breakfast all-in-all I will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Larry C,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are glad you found our hotel to be both comfortable and affordable. Our staff works hard to make sure our guests have the best possible stay, and we are delighted you found it worth staying with us again in the future. We also have exciting renovations in-work for our property which will enhance our guests' stay even more. We hope to host you again the next time you visit the Anaheim-Orange area again.  Thank you and best regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Nice large rooms and comfortable beds
Summary: Location is close to a lot of things in LA/OC area.  Get the suite with a separate living room/wet bar area for more space.  Breakfast is pretty good too.  The courtyard area is nice with some palm trees, tropical feel.  The rates vary almost every week so check back for better rates on their website.  Close to the Outlets at Orange which gave us something to do with the kids.
Manager Response: Dear tdouglas,  Thank you for your review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Its great to hear you enjoyed your stay. Our guests have frequently enjoyed the convenience of having a suite as well as the close proximity to many of the local attractions. We hope the next time you return, you will also take advantage of the shuttle to Disneyland, which we anticipate your children might enjoy. In addition, our hotel is close to sports venues like Angels Stadium offering yet another option for you and your family to enjoy. We appreciate you choosing our hotel and we hope you come to stay with us again soon.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My husband and I choose to stay at this location 4-5 times a year just for a mini vacation. Nice rooms, comfortable beds, quiet, nice court yard, great shuttle service. Usually the staff is very nice and friendly. However, this past stay the check in man was not friendly at all and our room that we always reserved was not saved for us this time.. We are considering changing to another hotel location because of our last experience.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca L,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. And thank you for making us your home away from home for your mini-vacations. We take great pride in providing our guests a great blend of roomy accommodations, convenient location, and comfortable amenities. We are sorry to hear your front desk experience was atypically poor. Our staff has often been described as friendly and welcoming, so we will forward your experience to our front desk staff and make sure those deficiencies are corrected. Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your business back.   Best regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: High quality hotel at affordable price
Summary: Stayed at this hotel one night on business and got a great night's sleep. Separate living and sleeping area with mini kitchen. Hot breakfast (eggs, waffles, sausage, toast) and pastries, cereals and fruit. Nice and helpful staff. Nothing overly fancy, and definitely in need of some TLC, but a nice hotel at a good price.
Manager Response: Dear Teri R,  Thank you for the kind review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange! We are so glad you enjoyed our accommodations and amenities during your stay. We take great pride in making sure our guests get the best value possible during their stay. Whether its providing roomy suites, friendly service, or a great meal to jumpstart your day, our staff works hard to ensure our guests have a comfortable stay. While you were here on business, we hope you were also able to enjoy our convenient proximity to local attractions like Angels Stadium, the outlet mall, and Disneyland. They are only a short 10 minute drive away! In the future, if you stay with us again, you will also find our public areas refreshed to provide an updated lobby and breakfast room as well as hallways.   We appreciate you choosing our hotel for your stay in the Anaheim-Orange area, and we hope to see you again.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This hotel was way over rated. They charge a resort fee. To allow them to sell there rooms cheaper. Beds weren't very comfortable and the rooms were in desperate need if remodeling. Bring room freshener. The staff was less than helpful. Breakfast was unedible, there was a line for the toaster! The front desk was left unattended for more the 10 minutes during checkout time
Manager Response: Dear hhurricane58,  First of all, thank you very much for sharing your experience of your stay. We apologize we didn't meet your expectations. Your comments will be shared and we will do our best to fix deficiencies. The Best Western International will be going through a brand relaunch very soon and we hope some of your concerns get resolved with it. Also, at the property-level, we will be doing some major renovations for public areas. Once everything is in place, we promise everything will be so much better. Again, we are so sorry and hope to earn your business back in the near future.  Thank you very much, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Not what it used to be but better than most
Summary: I have been coming back to this property for over a decade. The reason , value! A large Queen suite, two beds, two flat screen tvs, pull out couch, refrigerator, micro wave for less than a Disneyland hopper pass. Add in the saving of no fee for parking, free breakfast with wifii and its hard to say no to reserving a room. Close to freeway on and off ramps and you can be on your way to any location in So Cal. 5 minutes to an Angels game, 10 to Disneyland and 30 min to Newport or Huntington Beach.
Manager Response: Dear Carmen R,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, and thank you for making us your preferred hotel in the area. We are happy to hear that you continue to enjoy the multiple perks of staying at our hotel. Whether its the convenient location, spacious accommodations, or the amenities, our guests have found plenty of reasons to come back and stay with us again. We are sorry to hear that you did not find your stay to be as good as you remembered, but the next time you stay with us, you will be excited to find the property will be completing some exciting renovations to make our guests' stay even more enjoyable. Our lobby will received a modernized design and our breakfast area will be transformed to make your morning meal even more comfortable. Coupled with updates coming from the Best Western brand itself, we anticipate our long-time guests like you will be happy to see their trusted hotel better than before.  We look forward to seeing you again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Not worth the money I payed!!
Summary: I went to this hotel paying quite a bit because with two kids and staying in a hotel for 11 days I wanted to be able to cook so I took a room with a full kitchen but only a cookie sheet and a pizza pan where there to use for oven. They had no oven mitts and when I asked the front desk they I was told people don't cook and didn't even offer to get me any so i had to go out and buy them and cooking dishes for the oven no dish cloths was told to use hand towels. We had to ask them to change the sheets and the cleaning of the room was below average. Where we parked out back for all the time we where there garbage like bags and cans had not been picked up looked disgusting and filthy.

One thing is the rooms are large and can accommodate a family of 5. Second our room was clean. Third the breakfast is average however make sure you grab an apple to eat later. Fourth the location is good not too close to Disneyland and close enough to the Outlet Mall.   Fifth the staff is friendly and the service was good for us. Overall we felt it was a nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kim B,  Thank you for your kind and detailed review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! Its great to hear that you enjoyed our large rooms. Our property is 95% suites, allowing for families to rest comfortably. In addition, we are glad you were able to enjoy the proximity of our location and the breakfast. In the future, our breakfast room will be undergoing renovations to make our guests' breakfast experience even better. We hope to see you again to enjoy many of the improvements that are in the pipeline for our future guests!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: My husband and I are annual pass holders and go often to Disneyland.  We have stayed at a number of hotels that are closer to the park, but our best experiences have been at BWP Meridian Inn & Suites.  Our room is clean and the bed comfy, the hotel staff always go out of their way to make sure your stay is nothing but excellent!!  We have decided to make all of our future reservations here for future visits.
Manager Response: Dear JO ANNE H,  Thank you for the great review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange! It is great to hear you were able to take advantage of our central location to many of the neighboring attractions, particularly Disneyland. It is a short drive or shuttle ride away, allowing our guests to maximize the amount of time they can enjoy the theme park. We hope you were also able to enjoy our breakfast amenities prior to the fun you likely had at Disneyland. Please come visit us again. We hope to be your trusted home-away-from-home for a long time!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This was my 3rd time staying at this location. The first two times were great! location, breakfast and large rooms all check the boxes for what my family needs. This time my room was much smaller and the hotel was booked so there was no room change but what really made my decision to never return, was there blatant disregard and not caring that the chamber maid had stolen our clothes ! they were there before Breakfast and gone when we returned! Not one person that worked there or management cared to do anything about it!
Manager Response: Dear perterri,  Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are really sorry you feel this way about our property, we assure you that all of our team members are working really hard to make all of our guest’s stay very comfortable and memorable.  Looking back on your reservation, our record shows that your booking was processed online using a 3rd party website. We are sorry the incorrect room type was booked and due to our sold out status: we were unable to offer you any upgrade options. As for your missing item: Upon your request on the day after your departure, we checked our lost and found records and were unable to retrieve your missing item (yoga pants). At that time we also conducted a reading of your room lock and it confirmed that no one from our staff entered your guest room during breakfast hours, we understand that you are upset about the situation; however, we found no evidence that anyone could have stolen your pants while you were away for breakfast.   We are sorry you had a bad experience. Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your trust back. We value your feedback and hope to see you stay with us again soon.  Thank you, Management team

Summary: The place is really beautiful, the receptionist was very kind and helpful, he immediately told us how tho reach Disneyland for the next day and he sold us the ticket that cost 10$ a/r. He had been very kind also when we checked out because he kept our luggages for half day.  Room: the room was amazing, really big, clean. The sink of the bathroom was in the room separate from the bedroom obviously and the wc and shower was in the proper bathroom. All was very clean and they gave us a lot of shampoo and shower gel.  Our room was near the pool and we didn't hear any noise during the night. The wifi worked quite well even if we don't have a perfect signal, but you can have it just outside.  Amenities:  the pool was really nice and big and one was open until midnight if I remember
Manager Response: Dear Filgh91,  Thank you for taking the time write a great review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange. We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay. Our guests have enjoyed the perks of being in a centralized to local attractions like Disneyland, and we are happy to hear that you are another one. If you visit again, we hope you also enjoy the proximity to other local attractions like the outlet mall and sports stadiums. We are glad you enjoyed the amenities of our hotel. Our staff works hard to enjoy our guests have a relaxing stay.   We hope to see you again sometime soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We've stayed here once before but got a suite for $89 when the hotel wasn't full. This time we got a small room for $132 with a full house. The room smelled of chemicals when we arrived, the A/C unit was VERY loud and so were the neighboring units. The doors slam loudly, and you can hear everything going on around you. The food was just average and never is varied. After walking around the room in bare feet for about 20 minutes and then taking a shower, dirty footprints were evident.
Manager Response: Dear J7870VIdavids,  We apologize that your stay did not meet your expectations. Your comments will be shared with our staff and we will do our best to fix the deficiencies. The Best Western International will be going through brand relaunch very soon and we hope some of your concerns get resolved with it. Also, at the property level, we will be doing some major renovations for public areas. Once everything is in place, we promise everything will be so much better. Again, we are so sorry and hope to earn your business back in the near future.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Great Value for Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: A quick Uber away from the convention center gets you to this quiet all suite hotel. My room was huge, the bed was super comfortable and the breakfast was hot. The gym isn't the best so I just worked out in the sunshine in the courtyard.
Manager Response: Dear MomNH1717,  Thank you for your kind review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange. Our hotel's location has been a major plus for many of our guests over the years, and we are happy to hear you enjoyed the convenience of a quick Uber ride to the Anaheim Convention Center. You will find that many of the local attractions are also a very short ride away too, so we hope you return to explore Disneyland, the outlets, the sports stadiums, and much more. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed the large rooms. Our property is composed of primarily suites, so guests like you can enjoy a spacious home away from home while in town. We are sorry the gym was not to your liking, but we like that you took the initiative to exercise in the courtyard! With weather like we have in Southern California, it is always a great idea to take advantage of our plentiful sunshine!  Please come visit us again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We stayed here for 5 nights during July 2015 and had a comfortable stay. No problems whatsoever. The location is close to the freeway and served well as our base. The breakfast selection was plentiful and hearty! The gentleman that was serving the waffles was super kind and friendly. He made a lot of effort to keep the guests happy as I can see he was also super busy running around tidying and replenishing food. The breakfast area was large and even opens up to an outside patio where the pool is. However, as expected, it gets super busy so plan to go earlier or towards the end if you are not in a rush. Free wifi and parking was provided.
Manager Response: Dear Sheila V,  Thank you for taking the time to write us a wonderful review for our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim - Orange. It's great to hear you took advantage of our centralized location. Many of our guests have enjoyed being within close driving distance of Disneyland, the outlets, Angels Stadium, and many others. We are also happy to hear you enjoyed your breakfast experience! The waffles are certainly a favorite of some of our guests, and our staff works hard to make sure you enjoy a great meal to start your day. In the future, we have exciting improvements planned to make the breakfast area even more spacious and welcoming for our guests. We hope you return soon to enjoy our hotel again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: An excellent hotel in a great location
Summary: This is the second time I have stayed at the Best Western PLUS Meridian Inn & Suites.    It is ideally located for my purpose and so convenient to get to.    Staff at the check-in/out are very pleasant and efficient.    The in-room wifi is excellent and the included full breakfast is very good with lots of choices and two people on staff during b'fast hours, keeping the different food items replenished and the room clean and neat.   I found the hotel clean and very pleasant, with a lovely courtyard area.   The bed was comfortable with especially nice bed linen.   I would stay there any time I was in the general area.
Manager Response: Dear 278doreenf,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites. We are so glad you enjoyed the location, the front desk team, as well as the breakfast food choices. We hope you return to enjoy our amenities again! We are slated to have further improvements made to our public areas, resulting in an even more comfortable stay for our guests. Please come back and visit again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Large, comfortable rooms at good value
Summary: We are frequently in Orange County visiting family.  This property will become our new first choice for these visits.  The price point for a very large, comfortable and well appointed suite was perfect.  It's location was great for access to multiple freeways.  It was near decent restaurants, Anaheim Stadium, and Disneyland.  The usual breakfast buffet had some upgraded options.
Manager Response: Dear Greta H,  Thank you for your kind review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay, particularly the rooms and location. Our property primarily consists of suites, which provide ample room to help make your stay more comfortable. And the centralized location has been a perk of our hotel, allowing many of our guests the flexibility to conveniently visit the neighboring attractions. Our breakfast room is slated for some renovations in the future, providing an even better dining experience for our guests before they start their day.  We hope to see you again soon! Regards,  Charles K.

Summary: If you hate having your time wasted and important business guests inconvenienced then do not stay here.  Horrible front desk staff. I had a part of 3 rooms booked here. Important guests for a company meeting. They terribly mismanaged the booking process and made us look bad in front of our VIPs as a result. We had to call 3 times to fix the problems and they would not help us due to "policy". Apparently taking care of customers is not one of their policies. We had to call the main Best Western customer service number to handle our issues.   Terrible - will never stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory A,  First of all, thank you very much for sharing your experience. We sincerely apologize that we were unable to provide you a smooth booking process, particularly in front of your VIP guests. Your comments will be shared and we will do our best to correct the deficiencies.  At the property-level, we will be doing major renovations for public areas. In addition, the Best Western brand will going through relaunch soon that will further enhance our guests' experience. Once everything is in place, we promise everything will be so much better. We aim to make our hotel a place where valued guests can feel both comfortable and cared for.  Again, we are so sorry and hope to earn your business back in the near future.  Thank you very much, Charles K.

Summary Heading: You get moer than what you pay for
Summary: Everytime I stay at this hotel I am amazed at how spacious and nice everything is for the price. I always stay in a suite and the living room is very spacious and comfortable with more amenities than I need. It always feel like home.
Manager Response: Dear Adolfo C,  Thank you for your kind review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stays and that you especially liked the value of our suites. The majority of our hotel rooms are suites, meaning our guests can rest in spacious accommodations.  We look forward to continuing to be your home away from home in the future!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Americana, very basic and not exactly the Best in the Western choices..
Summary: BEST WESTERN MERIDIAN REVIEW  I stayed here to attend a convention a few miles away when hotels in the convention area were booked full. This area has Anaheim Convention Center, Angel Stadium, AND Disneyland, so it becomes quite populated!  The Best Western is a tribute to cheap American hotels everywhere, except for the "cheap" part due to the density of venues mentioned above, and definitely not the "Best" part of the name! Is this really the Best they can do?? Everything in this hotel screams out cost savings, and "We don't trust our patrons" sadly, although I did get the impression that some of the employees are trying to please. They just have a difficult set of parameters to work within.  The room was large and furnishings acceptable. The bed was actually comfortable and
Manager Response: Dear SalsabyJake,  Thank you for your feedback and we deeply apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay. Our team strives to provide the best customer service but it seems we have not met your expectations. In the near future, our property will be undergoing major updates to our public areas. It will include refreshed looks and amenities to our lobby, breakfast room, and more. In addition, the Best Western brand will be undergoing a brand refresh as well. These changes will enhance our hotel and allow for valued customers like yourself to have more enjoyable stays.   Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your business back. Again, we apologize for the inconveniences you experienced.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: This hotel is an excellent choice for a vacation get away to Anaheim.  The two room suites are comfortable and the hotel is very quiet.  The shuttle to Disneyland is inexpensive and runs on time.  Families and groups will enjoy the comfort of a large room, good breakfast and nice recreation area.
Manager Response: Dear Connie W,  Thank you for taking the time to review our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are glad you were able to join us for an enjoyable stay. We are glad you had a restful time with us, and hope you are able to stay with us again. We are planning exciting renovations for much of our public areas, so the next time you stay with us, you will also be able to enjoy an improved lobby, breakfast area, and more!  Thank you again for your review.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Stayed here while a group of us went to Disneyland. The price was good for such a roomy suite, good breakfast, lovely grounds, etc. Even though we were quite a distance from Disneyland it was a very nice stay. There were 5 of us, all adults, and it was nice to have the queen suite.
Manager Response: Dear goldberry5,  Thank you for your kind review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are encouraged to hear your stay with us was comfortable. The majority of the rooms in our hotel are suites, so that large groups like yours can rest comfortably. And in addition to Disneyland, our centralized location allows our guests a short commute to other local attractions like the outlet mall and Angels Stadium. We hope to see you again so that you can further enjoy the local area!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The desk staff, housekeeping and breakfast staff were excellent.  I specifically commend the breakfast staff for their dedication, excellent customer service and cleanliness. The location was a bit difficult for us to navigate from but it was centrally located.
Manager Response: Dear James G,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! The staff here at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange appreciate the opportunity to make your stay as comfortable as possible. The centralized location of our property has made visiting location attractions (such as Disneyland, the outlets, Angels Stadium, etc) convenient for many travelers over the years. In addition to the great location, many of our public areas will be receiving a refreshed look to further improve our guests' experience at our hotel.  Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you next time!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Suite was nice size but we were a party of 3 and no blanket was provided.  When front desk was called about this issue they stated there was no logical reason for this but could not offer.  Housekeeping did not show up twice during a 4 night stay.  Carpet in the suite was dirty.  Wouldn't recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear PLB201537,  Thank you so much for completing review on your stay and we deeply apologize for inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We definitely strive to provide you our best customer service but it seems we have not met your expectations. Our staff works hard to ensure our guests' rooms are as clean as possible, and we will pass on your comments to make sure your experience is not repeated with others.  Our property will be conducting major public area renovations including, hallways, lobby, front desk, and breakfast rooms very soon. It will be definitely refreshed once it's done and we hope we will have a chance to provide you better service with a better product at that time.  Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your business back. Again, we apologize for your inconvenience.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We stayed in a suite during our visit. There was a refrigerator in our room which is always a plus for us. The couch and bed were very comfortable. The breakfast was good but the dinning area became very crowded and it was posted in the dinning room to NOT take food to your room. There are dinning tables in the outdoor patio area but it was a chilly outside. They should add some outdoor heaters. They would be nice because the patio is right near the pool. Overall I would recommend staying here. We enjoyed it!
Manager Response: Dear anonoamis,  Thank you for your review of our hotel, the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your room during your stay with us. The majority of our rooms are suites, which are designed to ensure our guests are comfortable during their stay with us.   We also appreciate your comments regarding the breakfast food and the dining area. In the future, we have renovations planned for the breakfast area which we anticipate will make the guest dining experience more comfortable for all. We believe it will be a great improvement and we hope you return again to take advantage of it when it is complete!  Thank you for review and we hope to see you again soon.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: They have the friendliest staff. We always stay in the VIP or Executive room. The room is like a home away from home. Spacious, 2 rooms, 2 big TV's. Wet bar, fridge, microwave, coffee maker,  blow dryer. Very, very comfortable bed. Spa Jacuzzi tub is especially exceptional. We sometimes stay for a romantic get away. It is close to Orange Outlets Mall. Close for movie watching, shopping, and dinning. We sometimes stay for a trip to Disneyland, we sometimes stay for a trip to Knot's Berry Farm.  The location is in the middle of it all. But the best part of staying there is the amazing staff!
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca L,  Thank you for the wonderful review of the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are happy to be your home away from home in the Anaheim-Orange area. It is great to hear that you enjoyed your room as well. 95% of our hotel is composed of suites to ensure our guests have the ability to make the most of their stay with us. And, as you mentioned, the centralized location of our hotel has also been a perk for guests who may be interested in visiting Disneyland, the outlets, Angels Stadium, and more!   Your positive experience feedback will be shared with our staff. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to providing more great hotel stays for you in the future.  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Location ... OK  shuttle to Disney a plus  but a bit far from everything Facility ...  OLD  room  - SMALL  really Dated SERVICE ... TOP NOTCH, food, front desk  they really hustle and are very friendly and helpful -
Manager Response: Dear Michael V,  Thank you for your review of our hotel. We appreciate your comments and feedback. We are happy to hear you were able to take advantage of the shuttle to Disneyland. Our location's proximity to other attractions such as the outlets and Angel's Stadium (both within a 5 minute drive) have made it a convenient location for many guests over the years. Also, we are glad you had a great customer service experience. Our staff values  the opportunity to make your stay as comfortable as possible.  In the future, renovations will be made to many of the public areas, including the lobby, breakfast room, and hallways. We hope to have you back again so you can enjoy our continually improving amenities.  We hope to see you again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Although we have stayed at this hotel several times in the past during our visits to Disneyland, we found the hotel unsatisfactory this visit.  Before we arrived, my account was charged for the room.  The problem was that I wanted to use a charge card for the room.  It took several days, after paying for the room, for our checking account to be refunded.  I found this a bit disturbing. We had three parties staying at the hotel and had requested that we all be near each other on the Best Western website.  Not only were we not near each other, we were on three different floors.  When we arrived in our room, it was clean.  However, it had a strong chemical odor.  I had to buy room fresheners just to stay in the room.  The biggest let down was the breakfast.  In the past, the
Manager Response: Dear W433NSrichardh,  Thank you so much for completing review on your stay and we deeply apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay.  We always strive to provide the best customer service but it seems we have not met your expectations. We will pass on your comments regarding your room requests to our staff. There are times where our staff can be helping a large number of guests, and it appears your requests were missed in the process. We sincerely apologize for that. In addition, your feedback regarding the room will be passed on to our staff as well. We strive to provide rooms that allow our guests to rest comfortably, so we appreciate your comments regarding ways that can be potentially improved.  Our property will be conducting major public area renovations including, hallways, lobby, front desk, and breakfast rooms very soon. Once it's done, we hope we could have a chance to provide you better service with a better product at that time.  Please do not hesitate to contact us for anything we can do to earn your business back. Again, we apologize for your inconvenience.  Thank you, Charles K.

Summary Heading: High hopes, but a few too many misses
Summary: Based on some of the great reviews I had high hopes that this would be a great stay.  Sadly, it didn't work out that way.  We booked initially through a pre-paid site, then added a couple of extra rooms booked directly through the hotel.  That was a problem.  When we arrived, they didn't know how to treat us - with respect, or as P****line scum.  Sadly, scum is how we felt after check in.  We had requested 2 beds per room - mysteriously, that request was lost.  Then I was told they were sold out.  Then I was told there were "upgrades" available for $30 room/ per night.  Typical shakedown of pre-pay customers.  It was a night and day difference between the rooms booked direct and the pre-paid rooms.  Tiny vs. spacious.  Not happy at all at arrival.  A few more things were not as
Manager Response: Dear futzmaster,  First of all, thank you very much for sharing your experience of your hotel stay.  We sincerely apologize we didn't meet your expectations.  Your comments will be shared with our staff and we will do our best to fix the deficiencies you shared, particularly with respect to your experience with check-in. Best Western International will be going through brand relaunch very soon and we anticipate some of your concerns will also get resolved with it. Also, at the property-level, we will be doing some major renovations for public areas to further improve your stay.  Once everything is in place, we promise everything will be so much better. We aim to provide every guest with an experience that makes their stay as comfortable as possible.   Again, we are so sorry and hope to earn your business back in the near future.  Thank you very much, Charles K.

Summary: this hotel is not walkable to disney but there is a shuttle service for 5 dollars per person round trip that runs once an hour that takes you right to disney and back, it stops at 3 other hotels on the way but in all its about a 15 minute ride. we took a super shuttle to the hotel, cost 35 dollars for 2 people, very reasonable. the hotel itself has everything you need, including free wifi, free breakfast and a nice outdoor pool,  there is an outlet mall about a 5 minute taxi ride away. there is very little right by the facility, seems to be a business area. rooms are decent size, clean, big bed pillows were very hard, hotel needs better pillows, but otherwise if you are going to disney, and you can get a good price, this is a fine place to stay since you are not in the room that
Manager Response: Dear blustig77,  Thank you for your review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Orange-Anaheim. We are happy to hear you took advantage of the proximity of our hotel to many of the local attractions, particularly Disneyland. Our proximity to the outlet mall and sports stadiums also have made staying at our hotel convenient for many of our guests. In addition to the amenities you mentioned (free breakfast, wifi, and pool), we are making further improvements to our hotel in the coming year to make your stay even more comfortable and enjoyable. We appreciate your comment regarding the pillows and will pass it along to the hotel staff.  We hope to see you again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: We went to Disneyland on a tight budget for Christmas. This was a perfect room for our family. We had 4 adults a 2 small kids. Large and spacious for the kids to play and run after long days in the stroller! Price could not be beat!! FREE PARKING!! FREE BREAKFAST!! We would suggest sending someone down to get breakfast and bring it back to your room. It's very busy and not much seating. Staff is very helpful! It is right off a busy road but we felt very safe!! We will defiantly  stay there again!   Only About a 10 minute drive to Disneyland. Great Outlet mall close by and In and out is really close! One of our favorite restaurants was minutes away, Who Song and Larry's!! OMG so good! Thank you everyone there for helping make our trip so affordable and comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear Kathy A,  Thank you for taking the time to write us such a great review for the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We are happy that you enjoyed your stay. Because the majority of our rooms are suites, they offer lots of room for families. The central location of the hotel also is a plus for those looking to enjoy the attractions of the area. We are glad you enjoyed the free breakfast and hope you return in the future, as we have renovations planned for the breakfast room to make it even more accommodating for our guests.  We hope to see you again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: For a couple with two teens, the room offered enough space and good wi-fi connection to keep everyone happy.  We took the master bedroom and the kids slept in the living room on the pull out sofa bed.  We each had our own rooms.  We would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Byron G,  Thank you for your review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your hotel stay with us. And we also are happy to hear that you enjoyed our rooms. The vast majority of our rooms are suites and offer versatility for families like yours. Our property is also centrally located to local attractions such as Disneyland, the outlets, and Angels Stadium. We hope you and your family had an opportunity to enjoy these attractions during your stay with us or on future stays.  We hope to see you again!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Our family loved everything about this hotel. Thank you to the front desk staff ( Alex, Kim, and all the rest  who were alway pleasant and willing to help. The kids loved the breakfast and pool/courtyard area.  I  would recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Dear PlanetJanet1965,  Thank you for the wonderful review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. We are so proud to have provided such a wonderful experience for you and your family. Your kind comments will be shared with the front desk staff. Also, we are happy to hear your kids liked the pool/courtyard area. We have further renovations planned for that area which will make it even better in the future. We hope to have you here again in the future!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Whenever I go to Southern California, I always stay at the Meridian Inn & Suites.  Always clean and the staff extremely helpful.  Not far from Disneyland.  Pillows, pillows & more pillows, but one is my absolute favorite and every room has had at least one of these pillows!  Highly recommend for singles and families.
Manager Response: Dear northstategal,  First of all, we really appreciate you sparing time to write a review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange. Also, our property will be receiving further renovations so there will be more things for you to enjoy the next time you come back.  Thank you for making our hotel your primary place to stay when you visit Southern California.   Regards, Charles K.

Summary Heading: Great Service and Value for the Money
Summary: I have stayed at this Best Western PLUS property multiple times when in the area.  It is a great value, but what makes it a repeat destination is the staff.  They are very nice and extremely helpful. The rooms are nice enough, though the bathrooms in some rooms could use some updating.  I will often stay at the Best Western Meridian Inn & Suites when I travel to Disneyland.  It is close enough to be convenient, but far enough away to get away from all the activity of the parks at the end of the day for a relaxing evening.  The breakfast is adequate, with a mix of hot and cold items.  It appears to be the same every day, which can get old if you stay multiple nights.  But, it is far better than many "free hotel breakfasts" I have experienced.  I will stay here again when in the
Manager Response: Dear Rex56,  Thank you for your repeated business and for taking the time to share this review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange! We value your opinion and appreciate your review. The central location of our hotel to popular attractions like Disneyland, the outlet mall, and Angels Stadium make it convenient to many travelers like yourself.   We are currently planning further renovations to our property to continue to improve our guests' experience. We hope you return soon to enjoy them!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: The location may not be close to Disneyland but they have a free shuttle so the distance is worth it. The value was great for the quality stay we received. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Nothing was dysfunctional, everything worked. The lobby was inviting. The breakfast was perfect to fuel our day. Each staff member was very pleasant and cordial.
Manager Response: Thank you very much for sharing your experience at the Best Western Plus Meridian Inn & Suites, Anaheim-Orange!  We are so glad that we were able to provide you an enjoyable hotel experience. We also hope you had a chance to explore the surrounding attractions. The Outlet Mall and Angels stadium are within a 5 min drive, both with their share of restaurants as well.  Thank you very much again and see you next time!  Regards, Charles

Summary: Very good rooms.  The beds were amazingly comfortable for a hotel.  Driving to Disneyland is less than 15 minutes with easy access even during rush hour.  We were on the 3rd floor and the hotel only has 2 elevators and one of them were broken.  As I needed the work out it was no big deal and I am sure they will have it fixed soon.
Manager Response: We really appreciate your time writing a review of our Best Western Plus Meridian Inn and Suites, Anaheim-Orange. As you mentioned, the property is very centrally located with plenty of places nearby. In addition to Disneyland, there is an outlet mall and Angels Stadium nearby as well. We hope the next time you visit, you will get a chance to further enjoy the surrounding areas. Also, the elevator you mentioned has since completed its maintenance work.   We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Regards, Charles K.

Summary: Although this was a last minute decision, I was very pleased with my choice.  Since I checked in late and had to leave early, I can't rate too much, but upon check-in, was greeted by a helpful and friendly staff which processed me in quickly.  The parking was a little tricky as I was towing a trailer with a full size truck, but they informed me of the best places to park the rig.   Room was large, split with the bedroom/bathroom separated from the 'living room/kitchen area' which I don't see in many motels.  Although I cringe over worn out king beds, this one was extremely comfortable and made for a very relaxing night of rest.  Round tables with umbrellas outside next to the pool was an added bonus for me as I 'nuked' my dinner and went outside to eat in the cool air.  All

I hope you had a chance to look around the Outlet Mall and Angel's stadium nearby within 5 min drive! Thank you very much again and see you next time!  Management

Employees are rude, they lie to people to get you to book then when they admit they dont offer the services they tell you its your problem guess you shouldnt have stayed here. Summary Heading: Very reasonably priced hotel with a short drive to Disney
Summary: My fiancé and I stayed at this hotel for Halloween weekend. We had Disney tickets and planned to go to the parks each day of our stay.   The ladies at the front desk were very friendly and efficient in checking us in and out.   There was free breakfast served from 6-10. There were a variety of choices for breakfast and it was all very good.   There is free parking, and there isn't a bad spot in the lot as far as proximity, which was much appreciated when we came in at 1 a.m. after a full day at the parks.   The room was clean and had all the essentials. Everything we used was in great condition.   The hotel is right off the freeway, with a 10 minute drive to Disneyland. The area is also very quiet and free of a lot of traffic, both pedestrian and cars. Immediately in the area

GOOD BREAKFAST

It is close to the outlets at Orange, but I didn't feel safe walking there with my family. The shuttle runs every hour but at other hotels we've stayed at, shuttle runs are every 20 minutes. This one is every hour because it's so far. I stayed here through hotwire for seven nights and although I said there were three adults they gave us a king size bed and a sleeper sofa. Summary Heading: Room was good!  The rest, meh...
Summary: We stayed at this hotel to go to the 2 Disney parks. The room was good. Great air conditioning. Very comfortable bed and pillows. Pretty good insulation from the rooms around you. However--the staff wasn't great. Not very friendly in their customer service practices. Also, skip the free breakfast. The breakfast and outdoor seating area is overrun with rude adults and children trying to get food before going to Disney. Start your day stress-free; skip the free breakfast!

We had to drive to Disneyland as the hotel was not close enough to easily walk to but I think that is why the price is a little lower and the quality is a little better.  Its only about a 3 minute drive to the park and season pass holders get free parking.  The pool and hot tub was excellent and very relaxing after a hot day of park hopping.  Breakfast was above average and started us off without having to shop for breakfast spots.

Love the options for suites. It is nice to have a little privacy from the kids while they are trying to rest and you are still awake. Very clean, close to shopping and food. Safe area and lots of parking. Nice service staff.

The change of owners was felt by us.  No one working there seemed to care about our stay there.  We had ants in the bathroom #337, our room didn't get cleaned twice, due to a paper error.  When we checked out, there was so thank you for your stay or anything.

We were very pleased with the Room and the total atmosphere of the hotel. The courtyard was beautiful and the staff was very friendly and helpful. It was nice to have parking included in the room cost and also enough spaces for a guest of our to park, which was an issue for us when we wanted to visit someone else at a different hotel.   I would definitely recommend this hotel to someone and stay here again.

Carbs, fruit, protein, etc. =courtyard- beautiful, trust me! and you can eat there... lots of birds like your in tropics =common areas and grounds- immaculate! Great job housekeeping, I couldn't find one mess anywhere! (I'm in Military, so I look;-) =WiFi-

The hotel check in staff were very friendly and quick. They explained how the AC worked and all. To get to the room doors, you have to access an outer door...I liked the extra security. Our room was a 1 bedroom suite number 135. Usually when you walk into some rooms there's a weird smell....there wasn't any smell when we walked in, not even cleaning spray. The bed was firm, only downside is that the pillows were rock hard except for one. The bathroom was clean, just a crappy job with the grout during the upgrade. Shampoo and lotions were in dispensers...which I like, no waste in little bottles. Only downside to the entire room was the carpet

Microwave, fridge were an unexpected plus. Free Wifi and parking always appreciated. Breakfast-included was good and hearty - eggs, sausage, fresh waffles, plus the usual cereals, etc.  Breakfast room opens onto nice patio with gurgling fountain near the pool - lovely.  The hotel is off the beaten track - in an office park of sorts - but close to everything, safe and quiet.
